(Goodbye - staff)Glad to have been of assistance.
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)We have nothing to say to you.
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
The request came from a police vessel.
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)Get us out of here!
(variant)(refusal to do something)That is not something I will do.
(chosen reward)Please take one of these as thanks.
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)Is that supposed to be funny?
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)Death would be a preferable option!
(informing player)I was asked to drop my cargo.
(informing player)I was forced to drop my cargo.
We need to perform a transfer.
(first warning - generic)We cannot tolerate your actions.
(first warning to an attacking ship)Stop your attack immediately.
(warning of consequences - generic)You will now suffer the consequences.
(warning of consequences - opening fire)You are now being targeted.
(warning of consequences - sending ships)Ships are now being dispatched.
(warning of consequences - reporting)You will now be reported to local security forces.
(report of attack - ships)Reporting an attack against this vessel.
(report of attack - stations)Reporting an attack against this station.
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)Criminal record has been updated.
(report of attack generic)Reporting a criminal offence.
(variant)(ship complies to police instructions)You have done the right thing, pilot.
(ship does not comply)You have refused to comply.
(reporting)This is sector security reporting criminal activity.
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)Watch out for security patrols.
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)We have been found by security. Instructions?
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)Just drop the cargo!
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)They follow my instructions so willingly.
(report on enemy activity)Too risky to engage.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We were hit.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)Something hit us.
(capital or m-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We're taking hits.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)There will be little difficulty in defeating them.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)They cannot defend themselves much longer.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Continue to attack the target.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Keep up the pressure on the target.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Let them plead in vain.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Show them no mercy.
(variant)(retaliation)Your foolish actions will have dire consequences.
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)The light fails me!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Save me!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)My life, I pray!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)No! Stop this!
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)Do you really think you are a match for me?
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Please have mercy!
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Do not kill me!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Spare us!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)We are no longer a threat. Spare us.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Allow me to live!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)You have defeated me. Stop now.
(fleeing from combat)Enough of this. I will take my leave!
(pilot bailing from ship)Miserable wretch! Abandoning my vessel.
(relief line)I feel blessed that I survived.
(congratulations after combat from captain)Well done, everyone!
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)We have new attack orders.
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)New attack orders!
(preparing new attack orders)Prepare to open fire on the target.
(preparing new attack orders during combat)Attack this target!
(reaction to friendly fire)Hey, will you stop firing?
(reaction to friendly fire)You're wrecking my shields!
(reaction to friendly fire)Why are you shooting me?
(enemy ship or station exploding)It's going to blow!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)There is little point in you continuing.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)A Paranid is not so easy to defeat.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)Feeble!
(variant)(enemy destroyed - report)The target has been eliminated.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)Such aggression cannot go unpunished.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)You have made a grave error.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)You want more? So be it.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)This will be another Paranid victory.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Hold your position and prepare to die!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Death will come to you soon.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)You attempt to insult me?
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Your threats are beneath me.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Your attempts at intimidation are weak.
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)There is no chance of that!
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)I did not intend to shoot you, but you were in my way.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)That mechanical monstrosity is too accurate. I must obliterate it.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)You will not defeat me so easily.
(variant)(threat)Your skills are no match for mine.
(variant)(threat)You will feel the pain of defeat.
(variant)(torpedo use)A torpedo will ensure a swift victory.
(variant)(losing an enemy)I will shake off this nuisance.
(variant)(losing an enemy)They will not be able follow me any longer.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)Your weakness will be your undoing.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)I am unconcerned by your efforts.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)I have only just started.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)You will not survive this encounter.
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)You will strike a deal with me, if you know what is good for you.
(variant)(NPC bribe fails)Your poor judgment does not surprise me.
(variant)(NPC hired)Your decision to employ me is a good one.
Last order could not be completed.
(order added to queue - informal)It's been added to the list.
The order might take longer than expected.
Pass on new coordinates to following ships.
Inform me when all ships have arrived.
All ships have arrived at destination.
(command)Tell group leader we've spotted enemy activity.
(relay report)They say it's safe to engage.
(relay report)They say it's too risky to engage.
One of our wingmen is asking for backup.
(escort leaves)You're on your own from here.
(grateful)Might not have made it without you.
(during combat)Get on the line! We need backup, now!
(group of small ships - winning)We're all over them!
(group of small ships - winning)We've got them now!
(group of small ships - losing)They're all over us!
(group of small ships - losing)We can't stand this.
(response to distress call - singular)Hang on! I'm on my way!
(response to distress call - plural)We've received your call. We're on the way.
Please follow directions to designated docking position.
They've marked our docking position for us.
Get the crew to ready a docking bay.
It's an honour to have you aboard.
We're pleased to welcome you aboard.
(Informing player ship will soon undock)The ship will be undocking soon.
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)I'll wait for you to tell me to take off.
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)Let me know when you want to take off.
There's a ship preparing to undock.
Departing ship, you are clear to undock. Safe travels.
Bring away from the docking position. Slowly.
Use these criteria for the search.
I've found a trade offer matching our criteria.
Tell that station we are on our way.
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)Which ship needs the work?
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)I will find it over here.
(variant)(fluff - finished repair)The work is all done.
(variant)(fluff - completed upgrade / repair)I have completed this.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)My work is almost done.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)What do you want me to do now?
(order for new units)Let's make an order for new units.
(order for new ammo)Let's make an order for some more ammunition.
(cap ship repair)Ask the station to start repairs.
(cap ship / station repair)Launching repair units now.
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)This is sector security.
(ship scan warning - cargo)Please halt. We will be scanning your cargo hold.
(ship scan warning - inventory)Please halt. We will be scanning your inventory.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)The scan is finished. Move along!
(ship scan result - something found)We've detected contraband.
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)Release your contraband immediately.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)Scan if you must.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)What did you expect?
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)That was supposed to remain hidden.
(variant)(ship scanned - illegal)Do not scan without my permission!
(report to superior)My ship is being scanned.
(variant)(ship scan warning)I will investigate your cargo now.
(variant)(ship scan result)Your cargo is suprisingly interesting.
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)I will allow you to have my cargo.
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)You may keep my ship.
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)I'm noticing a small breach. It looks like someone used explosives on the hull.
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)Electronics have gone dead somewhere. Someone used an EMP device.
(station / ship hacked)It looks like someone's hacked us.
(station security saw suspicious activity)We've picked up suspicious activity.
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)Security vessels are reporting suspicious activity.
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Send out additional security vessels.
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Launch emergency fighters.
Make sure service crew know to fix the damage.
(call to security forces - minor)Look out for any suspicious activity.
(call to security forces - major)Tell us of any suspicious activity immediately.
(call to security forces - search)Scan for suspicious activity.
Look only for our target resource.
(NPC moves onto player's ship)I'm aboard your ship and ready to go.
(NPC moves off player ship)The journey was not unpleasant. You have my thanks.
(No room on player's ship)You don't have enough room on your ship right now.
(NPC wants to leave ship)Drop me off at the nearest station.
(Player receives licence)Congratulations on your new licence.
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)If you're looking to find some black market merchandise, I'm the one to talk to.
(Friendly greeting)It's good to see you, friend.
(Allied greeting)It's an honour to see you here.
(Start of greeting)On behalf of our organisation: (keep space)
We need to damage the target further.
(to marine)Alright, get out of there. Abort.
(boarding pod launched)Pod launched. Moving to target.
(begin breach)We're making our way through the hull.
(marine lost during breach)Man down! Watch out for countermeasures on the hull!
One of the teams is pinned down.
(lots of fighting noise)We're taking heavy losses.
(lots of fighting noise)We're pushing through. Lots of resistance.
We've secured several sections. Moving on.
The commander is dead. We will resist to the last!
I have a team working on bypassing a lockdown.
The crew seems to be abandoning ship.
The self-destruct has been activated. We're working on disabling it.
I don't think we can make it to the bridge. Requesting abort.
I'm calling it. Abort! Get back to your pods!
(self-destruct imminent, somber)Sorry, Sir. This isn't looking good.
(target damaged)Don't destroy the target while we're in here!
(emergency event mission offer)I could really use some help right now.
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)I'm taking a big risk by broadcasting, so if you decode this transmission, keep it to yourself. I have work that needs doing.
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone hear me?! Hello?! I'm not supposed to be broadcasting but I need help! Please! I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone here me?! I need help! Please, if you can hear this, I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help)Hey! I know this is unconventional, but if you can hear this, I could use some help.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Don't let them get away!
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal cargo on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal wares on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal data on drone detected.
(player looks at offer - generic)Are you interested in a job?
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)You shouldn't have any trouble with this.
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)You'll need your wits about you for this.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)You decrypted my signal. Good.
(player looks at illegal mission offer)This could be lucrative for both of us.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)I'm glad you found my signal.
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)I hope you can help!
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)So you're still interested?
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)I knew you wouldn't resist.
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)You came back? Does that mean you'll help?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)We have decided to offer you a place on our forthcoming operation. Do you accept?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)Yes, I will participate. My funds are depleted and this will help replenish them.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)I need to dispose of these things. Are you able to buy them?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)Yes. Just come to my usual location on this station.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)These are the coordinates of a lockbox. The items are inside.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)I am much to busy to get them immediately, but I will collect them when I am ready.
(player declines mission offer)Come and find me if you change your mind.
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)Ah... you'll be back. I'm sure.
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)What?! No! Please!
(player accepts mission offer)I knew I could count on you.
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)Alright. If you think you can handle it.
(player accepts illegal opportunity)Smart move. Don't mess this up.
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)Thank you! Good luck!
(mission update)There's been a change of plans with the job.
(partial success)If that's the best you could do... sure.
(failed mission)I hope you don't think you're being paid for that.
(success in mission chain)We're one step closer to completion.
(failure in mission chain)That didn't go well, but we might still be able to salvage this.
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)Sorry. Looks like your services are no longer required.
My responsibility is to coordinate our forces in our campaign against the heretics of the so-called 'Holy Order'. Pilots such as you have been encouraged to join our cause.
Your being here means that you have gained recognition as a worthy friend of the Paranid Empire.
Your being here means that you have gained recognition as a true champion of the Paranid Empire.
There will always be place for pilots who share our ideals.
This schism within the Paranid has humiliated us beyond measure. Our once proud race has been likened to that of squabbling infants, all because of ineptitude and cowardice.
Our foe are fellow Paranid, so any victory will not be easy. As such, we require you undergo a trial.
I am curious to see how you fare compared to my Paranid brethren.
We will grant you the choice of tasks, from combat deployments to construction work. What is available will depend on the current situation in the area.
You will be paid as you complete your allocated tasks, and should we see fit, you will be further awarded.
It is rare for one such as yourself to be so interested in Paranid matters. I will indulge you.
Is it a rather deplorable situation. During the time of the deactivated Jump Gates, many Paranid found themselves cut off from our home systems.
Without the Pontifex Maximus to guide them, a number of factions took the action to hatch a replacement. It was a desperate act, but somewhat understandable.
However, on reconnecting with us, several factions refused to submit to the true Pontifex leading us to strike them down.
And now, only the heretics of the 'Holy Order' remain. Even when shunned by many, they still find the means to wage a war against us.
Should they concede and put their capabilities to use in the Empire, we would find ourselves unmatched.
I will select a suitable task for you momentarily.
I look forward to your return.
You will now find tasks related to our conflict with the Order in your mission interface.
There are currently no open tasks.
We will not simply have anyone interfere in our matters. Do not bother us unless you have proven yourself worth our time.
We are still passing judgement on your previous performance. Leave us.
Do not bring us shame with a poor performance.
We do not currently deem you worthy of aiding us in our cause.
Your performance during your last assignment was far below our standards. Begone.
Should you improve yourself, you may yet get a chance to aid us.
The mighty Paranid Empire calls for skilled pilots to join us in crushing the heretics.
Those wishing to join must be unyielding in their ideals and willing to fight for the one true Pontifex.
Our goals remain to repel any heretic aggression and quash their rebellion. If you believe yourself worthy, join us.
(briefing status - optimistic)Our recent efforts against the Order are going well, as expected.
(briefing status - optimistic)In our skirmishes with the Order, we very clearly prevailed.
(briefing status - optimistic)Our efforts have pushed the Order deeper into their territory.
(briefing status - optimistic)The Order are at the brink of losing large swathes of territory.
(briefing status - optimistic)Many engagements against the heretics have ended in victory.
(briefing status - optimistic)We continue to humble the Order at every turn. They will soon fall.
(briefing status - pessimistic)The Order continue to deal decisive strikes against our forces.
(briefing status - pessimistic)Like a cornered animal, the Order has launched desperate attacks, some of which effective.
(briefing status - pessimistic)The Order occasionally use their Paranid intellect to conjure effective strategies. We will adapt.
(briefing status - pessimistic)We have lost some ground to the Order but it will not change the outcome of this conflict.
(briefing status - pessimistic)The Order has found the zeal to give us pause but we will soon retaliate.
(briefing status - pessimistic)Our recent efforts against the Order were poorly formulated.
(briefing status - instruction)Take notice of these instructions and judge where you can best assist.
(briefing status - instruction)Study these options and select a task that best suits your abilities.
(briefing status - instruction)View what tasks need completing and judge what suits your skills.
(briefing status - instruction)Take a look at these directives before deciding how you can help us.
(briefing status - instruction)Look through our current objectives and select an area in which you can aid us.
(briefing status - thanks)We thank you for your help in this conflict.
(briefing status - thanks)The Paranid Empire thanks you for your help.
(briefing status - thanks)Very good. May you survive to join us in victory.

(reporting)This is sector security reporting criminal activity.

(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)It does not take much to persuade these fools.

(variant)(retaliation)You will pay dearly for your actions.
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Where is the light?
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)I ask for deliverance!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Hear my prayers!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Stop! No!
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)You cannot hope to defeat me.
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)Your death will come soon.
(variant)(taunt line - generic)I will turn you to space-dust.
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)We ask you to spare us!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Stop! We are at your mercy!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Spare me!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)I can fight no longer. Stop!
(fleeing from combat)Enough of this. I will take my leave!
(pilot bailing from ship)Miserable wretch! Abandoning my vessel.
(relief line)I feel blessed that I survived.
(congratulations after combat from captain)Well done, everyone!

(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)New attack orders!

(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)You will not stop me so easily.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)I am not deterred by that.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)That was foolish. I will teach you a lesson.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)You show great lack of wisdom.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)If that was insufficient, more can be arranged.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Your forthcoming defeat is unquestionable.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Remain there. You will die anyway.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Prepare to die.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Your words have no effect on me.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Is that the best threat you can manage?
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)I will not be intimidated by you.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)That did not impress me.
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)No, that will not happen!
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)That was unintentional, but it was your own fault.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)That unholy machine hit me! It must be struck down!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)I can withstand far more than that.
(variant)(threat)Your only contribution to this fight will be your death.
(variant)(missile use)My missiles will strike them down!
(variant)(torpedo use)My torpedo will ensure their defeat.
(variant)(losing an enemy)I will shake off this minor irritant.
(variant)(losing an enemy)Enough! I will lose them.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)You dare to attack, yet you are weak!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)Your attack is ineffectual.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)You have seen only the start.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Do not expect to survive this.
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)It would be wise of you to strike a deal with me.
(variant)(NPC bribe fails)I am disappointed, but not surprised.
(variant)(NPC hired)A wise decision. You will find me a good employee.
(variant)(NPC fired)No doubt someone else will have work for me.

All ships have arrived at destination.
(command)Tell group leader we've spotted enemy activity.
(relay report)They say it's safe to engage.
(relay report)They say it's too risky to engage.
One of our wingmen is asking for backup.
(escort leaves)You're on your own from here.
(grateful)Might not have made it without you.
(during combat)Get on the line! We need backup, now!
(group of small ships - winning)We're all over them!
(group of small ships - winning)We've got them now!
(group of small ships - losing)They're all over us!
(group of small ships - losing)We can't stand this.
(response to distress call - singular)Hang on! I'm on my way!
(response to distress call - plural)We've received your call. We're on the way.
Please follow directions to designated docking position.
They've marked our docking position for us.
Get the crew to ready a docking bay.
It's an honour to have you aboard.
We're pleased to welcome you aboard.
(Informing player ship will soon undock)The ship will be undocking soon.
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)I'll wait for you to tell me to take off.
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)Let me know when you want to take off.
There's a ship preparing to undock.
Departing ship, you are clear to undock. Safe travels.
Bring away from the docking position. Slowly.
Use these criteria for the search.
I've found a trade offer matching our criteria.
Tell that station we are on our way.
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)Which ship needs the work?
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)Over there, no doubt.
(variant)(fluff - completed upgrade / repair)That is much better now.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)My work on this is almost complete.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)Do you have another task for me now?
(order for new units)Let's make an order for new units.
(order for new ammo)Let's make an order for some more ammunition.
(cap ship repair)Ask the station to start repairs.
(cap ship / station repair)Launching repair units now.
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)This is sector security.
(ship scan warning - cargo)Please halt. We will be scanning your cargo hold.
(ship scan warning - inventory)Please halt. We will be scanning your inventory.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)The scan is complete. Go!
(ship scan result - something found)We've detected contraband.
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)Release your contraband immediately.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)Yes, yes. You may scan.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)I am not surprised, and neither should you be.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)You would do well to keep out of my business, and my cargo.
(variant)(ship scanned - illegal)You are not authorised to do that!
(report to superior)My ship is being scanned.
(variant)(ship scan warning)What do you have for me, lowerlife?
(variant)(ship scan result)If you are lucky, I may allow you to keep some of this.
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)Keep the cargo.
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)My ship belongs to you now.
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)I'm noticing a small breach. It looks like someone used explosives on the hull.
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)Electronics have gone dead somewhere. Someone used an EMP device.
(station / ship hacked)It looks like someone's hacked us.
(station security saw suspicious activity)We've picked up suspicious activity.
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)Security vessels are reporting suspicious activity.
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Send out additional security vessels.
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Launch emergency fighters.
Make sure service crew know to fix the damage.
(call to security forces - minor)Look out for any suspicious activity.
(call to security forces - major)Tell us of any suspicious activity immediately.
(call to security forces - search)Scan for suspicious activity.
Look only for our target resource.
(NPC moves onto player's ship)I'm aboard your ship and ready to go.
(NPC moves off player ship)The journey was not unpleasant. You have my thanks.
(No room on player's ship)You don't have enough room on your ship right now.
(NPC wants to leave ship)Drop me off at the nearest station.
(Player receives licence)Congratulations on your new licence.
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)If you're looking to find some black market merchandise, I'm the one to talk to.
(Friendly greeting)It's good to see you, friend.
(Allied greeting)It's an honour to see you here.
(Start of greeting)On behalf of our organisation: (keep space)
We need to damage the target further.
(to marine)Alright, get out of there. Abort.
(boarding pod launched)Pod launched. Moving to target.
(begin breach)We're making our way through the hull.
(marine lost during breach)Man down! Watch out for countermeasures on the hull!
One of the teams is pinned down.
(lots of fighting noise)We're taking heavy losses.
(lots of fighting noise)We're pushing through. Lots of resistance.
We've secured several sections. Moving on.
The commander is dead. We will resist to the last!
I have a team working on bypassing a lockdown.
The crew seems to be abandoning ship.
The self-destruct has been activated. We're working on disabling it.
I don't think we can make it to the bridge. Requesting abort.
I'm calling it. Abort! Get back to your pods!
(self-destruct imminent, somber)Sorry, Sir. This isn't looking good.
(target damaged)Don't destroy the target while we're in here!
(emergency event mission offer)I could really use some help right now.
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)I'm taking a big risk by broadcasting, so if you decode this transmission, keep it to yourself. I have work that needs doing.
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone hear me?! Hello?! I'm not supposed to be broadcasting but I need help! Please! I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone here me?! I need help! Please, if you can hear this, I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help)Hey! I know this is unconventional, but if you can hear this, I could use some help.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Don't let them get away!
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal cargo on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal wares on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal data on drone detected.
(player looks at offer - generic)Are you interested in a job?
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)You shouldn't have any trouble with this.
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)You'll need your wits about you for this.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)You decrypted my signal. Good.
(player looks at illegal mission offer)This could be lucrative for both of us.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)I'm glad you found my signal.
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)I hope you can help!
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)So you're still interested?
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)I knew you wouldn't resist.
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)You came back? Does that mean you'll help?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)You may join our upcoming sortie. Do you think you can be ready in time?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)I accept your offer. I will earn my share of the rewards many times over.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)My activities are coming under increasing scrutiny. Will you buy these things from me?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)Very well. You will find me at my usual location on this station.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)Even you should be able to find the lockbox with the items in it, if I give you the coordinates.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)I will collect them later. I am too busy at the moment.
(player declines mission offer)Come and find me if you change your mind.
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)Ah... you'll be back. I'm sure.
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)What?! No! Please!
(player accepts mission offer)I knew I could count on you.
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)Alright. If you think you can handle it.
(player accepts illegal opportunity)Smart move. Don't mess this up.
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)Thank you! Good luck!
(mission update)There's been a change of plans with the job.
(partial success)If that's the best you could do... sure.
(failed mission)I hope you don't think you're being paid for that.
(success in mission chain)We're one step closer to completion.
(failure in mission chain)That didn't go well, but we might still be able to salvage this.
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)Sorry. Looks like your services are no longer required.
My task here is to help coordinate our forces in our campaign to quell the aggression of lesser races, the Argon in particular. This is no small task and requires aid from pilots such as you.
Your being here means that you have gained recognition as a worthy friend of the Holy Order.
Your being here means that you have gained recognition as a true champion of the Holy Order.
There will always be place for pilots willing to represent our cause.
This conflict is a taxing one. The misguided Paranid of the Godrealm have sought aid from the many other races, involving them in our holy struggle.
The Argon are foes which are particularly troublesome. We will not risk low-skilled rabble jeopardising our operations, so we require you undergo a trial.
Of course, with you being Argon yourself, we will hold you under much scrutiny.
We will grant you the choice of tasks, from combat deployments to construction work. What is available will depending on the current situation in the area.
You will be paid as you complete your allocated tasks, and should we see fit, you will be further awarded.
If you expect me to divulge sensitive information, you are quite mistaken. However, I will humour you.
The Paranid Empire has had a history of conflict with the Argon, and now it has fallen to us to stem their expansion towards our space.
I am sure that many have described this conflict as blind xenophobia on our part, but that is far from the case. While we deem them lesser beings, we are not opposed to coexistance.
However, they choose to side with the Godrealm as well as ignore our warnings on encroaching on our space. We will do what we must to protect our interests.
I expect a number within our ranks do wish for their eradication but I am far more benevolent. A crushing defeat will do.
I do hope they will give us battles worthy of mention in the annals of Paranid history.
I will select a suitable task for you momentarily.
I look forward to your return.
You will now find tasks related to our conflict with the Argon in your mission interface.
There are currently no open tasks.
We will not simply have anyone interfere in Holy Order matters. Do not bother us unless you have proven yourself worthy.
We are still passing judgement on your previous performance. Begone.
Do not forget that you are representing our glorious order. Do not bring us shame.
We do not currently deem you worthy of aiding us in our cause.
Your performance during your last assignment was far below our standards. Leave me be.
Should you improve yourself, you may yet get a chance to aid us.
The glorious Holy Order calls for skilful pilots to join us in defending our space from the Argon Federation.
This is not a trivial matter. Those wishing to join must be righteous and relentlessly loyal.
Our goals remain to hold our space from Argon aggression and quash their ability to wage their little war against us. If you are worthy, join us.
(briefing status - optimistic)Our recent efforts against the Argon Federation are going well, as we expected.
(briefing status - optimistic)In the many encounters with the Argon, we naturally prevailed.
(briefing status - optimistic)Our efforts have lead to the Argon struggling to organise their forces.
(briefing status - optimistic)The Argon are at the brink of losing large swathes of territory.
(briefing status - optimistic)We have won many engagements with the Argon Federation. We expect it to continue.
(briefing status - optimistic)We continue to humiliate the Argon at every turn.
(briefing status - pessimistic)Through underhanded means, the Argon have scored some victories against us.
(briefing status - pessimistic)Our enemy does on occasion display some intelligence capable of giving us pause.
(briefing status - pessimistic)We believe the Argon are being aided by the Godrealm, explaining their gains.
(briefing status - pessimistic)We have lost some ground to the Argon but it will not change the outcome of this war.
(briefing status - pessimistic)The Argon have taken advantage of our hubris but we will strike when they overextend.
(briefing status - pessimistic)Our recent efforts against the Argon were poorly formulated.
(briefing status - instruction)Take notice of these instructions and judge where you can best assist.
(briefing status - instruction)Study these options and select a task that best suits your abilities.
(briefing status - instruction)View what tasks need completing and judge what suits your skills.
(briefing status - instruction)Take a look at these directives before deciding how you can help us.
(briefing status - instruction)Look through our current objectives and select an area in which you can aid us.
(briefing status - thanks)We thank you for your help in this conflict.
(briefing status - thanks)The Holy Order of the true Pontifex thanks you for your help.
(briefing status - thanks)Very good. We hope you survive to see our victory.

page.title: Paranid NPC 6
page.descr: Lines for Paranid NPC 6
page.t: (Metadata, do not translate)[paranid] male female basic
(Goodbye - staff)Glad to have been of assistance.
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)We have nothing to say to you.
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
The request came from a police vessel.
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)Get us out of here!
(variant)(refusal to do something)No, I will not.
(chosen reward)Please take one of these as thanks.
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)You surely cannot be serious?
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)Surrender to you? No!
(informing player)I was asked to drop my cargo.
(informing player)I was forced to drop my cargo.
We need to perform a transfer.
(first warning - generic)We cannot tolerate your actions.
(first warning to an attacking ship)Stop your attack immediately.
(warning of consequences - generic)You will now suffer the consequences.
(warning of consequences - opening fire)You are now being targeted.
(warning of consequences - sending ships)Ships are now being dispatched.
(warning of consequences - reporting)You will now be reported to local security forces.
(report of attack - ships)Reporting an attack against this vessel.
(report of attack - stations)Reporting an attack against this station.
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)Criminal record has been updated.
(report of attack generic)Reporting a criminal offence.
(variant)(ship complies to police instructions)That was unexpectedly wise of you.
(ship does not comply)You have refused to comply.
(reporting)This is sector security reporting criminal activity.
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)Be careful. There may be security patrols.
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)Security have found us. What do you want us to do?
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)Just dispose of the cargo!
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)So easy to make them do my bidding.
(report on enemy activity)Too risky to engage.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We were hit.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)Something hit us.
(capital or m-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We're taking hits.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)They are barely worthy of our attention.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)Their defences will be breached soon.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Continue to attack the target.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Keep up the pressure on the target.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Ignore their futile pleas.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Do not show these lowerlifes mercy.
(variant)(retaliation)Your punishment will be swift and severe.
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Am I forsaken?
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)This is excessive!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)I pray to live!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)I do not deserve this! Stop!
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)Your inferior skills will ensure your defeat.
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)I do not deserve to be killed!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)We request that you spare our lives!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)We pose no threat to you. Stop shooting!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Let me live!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Stop! I declare myself defeated.
(fleeing from combat)Enough of this. I will take my leave!
(pilot bailing from ship)Miserable wretch! Abandoning my vessel.
(relief line)I feel blessed that I survived.
(congratulations after combat from captain)Well done, everyone!
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)We have new attack orders.
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)New attack orders!
(preparing new attack orders)Prepare to open fire on the target.
(preparing new attack orders during combat)Attack this target!
(reaction to friendly fire)Hey, will you stop firing?
(reaction to friendly fire)You're wrecking my shields!
(reaction to friendly fire)Why are you shooting me?
(enemy ship or station exploding)It's going to blow!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)You are entirely inadequate as a pilot.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)I cannot be defeated that easily.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)That was nothing.
(variant)(enemy destroyed - taunt)For the glory of the Paranid Empire!
(variant)(enemy destroyed - report)I have destroyed the target.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)The consequences of your aggression will be dire.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)Such a foolish mistake.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)There is plenty more of that available.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Another Paranid victory is assured.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)I will make your death swift.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Death is upon you.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Your feeble insults mean nothing to me.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)You attempt to threaten me?
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)You do not intimidate me.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)I'm an unimpressed by you.
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)Most certainly not!
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)I tried to avoid you, but you seemed determined to be hit.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)I will destroy this abominable machine before it does more damage.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)I will not be deterred so easily.
(variant)(missile use)I will use missiles to defeat them.
(variant)(torpedo use)I will strike them down with a torpedo.
(variant)(losing an enemy)I will lose this irritant.
(variant)(losing an enemy)They shall not follow me!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)You dare to attack a superior opponent?
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)I am not concerned by your feeble attack.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)This is only the start.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Your destruction is assured.
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)I have an arrangement to offer you. You should accept.
(variant)(NPC bribe succeeds)You have good judgment for a lowerlife.
(variant)(NPC hired)Employing me was a good decision on your part.
(variant)(NPC fired)Never mind. Someone else will employ me.
Last order could not be completed.
(order added to queue - informal)It's been added to the list.
The order might take longer than expected.
Pass on new coordinates to following ships.
Inform me when all ships have arrived.
All ships have arrived at destination.
(command)Tell group leader we've spotted enemy activity.
(relay report)They say it's safe to engage.
(relay report)They say it's too risky to engage.
One of our wingmen is asking for backup.
(escort leaves)You're on your own from here.
(grateful)Might not have made it without you.
(during combat)Get on the line! We need backup, now!
(group of small ships - winning)We're all over them!
(group of small ships - winning)We've got them now!
(group of small ships - losing)They're all over us!
(group of small ships - losing)We can't stand this.
(response to distress call - singular)Hang on! I'm on my way!
(response to distress call - plural)We've received your call. We're on the way.
Please follow directions to designated docking position.
They've marked our docking position for us.
Get the crew to ready a docking bay.
It's an honour to have you aboard.
We're pleased to welcome you aboard.
(Informing player ship will soon undock)The ship will be undocking soon.
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)I'll wait for you to tell me to take off.
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)Let me know when you want to take off.
There's a ship preparing to undock.
Departing ship, you are clear to undock. Safe travels.
Bring away from the docking position. Slowly.
Use these criteria for the search.
I've found a trade offer matching our criteria.
Tell that station we are on our way.
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)Which ship needs the work?
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)It is that way.
(variant)(fluff - completed upgrade / repair)The work is completed.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)This will be completed shortly.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)I am ready for another task.
(order for new units)Let's make an order for new units.
(order for new ammo)Let's make an order for some more ammunition.
(cap ship repair)Ask the station to start repairs.
(cap ship / station repair)Launching repair units now.
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)This is sector security.
(ship scan warning - cargo)Please halt. We will be scanning your cargo hold.
(ship scan warning - inventory)Please halt. We will be scanning your inventory.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)Surprisingly, your scan is clean.
(ship scan result - something found)We've detected contraband.
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)Release your contraband immediately.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)Scan, but make it quick.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)You expected something different? Hmpf.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)That is unfortunate.
(report to superior)My ship is being scanned.
(variant)(ship scan warning)Your cargo requires closer examination.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)Nothing at all? That is unfortunate.
(variant)(ship scan result)You have interesting cargo. I will decide what to take.
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)Take my cargo and go!
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)I will give you my ship.
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)I'm noticing a small breach. It looks like someone used explosives on the hull.
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)Electronics have gone dead somewhere. Someone used an EMP device.
(station / ship hacked)It looks like someone's hacked us.
(station security saw suspicious activity)We've picked up suspicious activity.
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)Security vessels are reporting suspicious activity.
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Send out additional security vessels.
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Launch emergency fighters.
Make sure service crew know to fix the damage.
(call to security forces - minor)Look out for any suspicious activity.
(call to security forces - major)Tell us of any suspicious activity immediately.
(call to security forces - search)Scan for suspicious activity.
Look only for our target resource.
(NPC moves onto player's ship)I'm aboard your ship and ready to go.
(NPC moves off player ship)The journey was not unpleasant. You have my thanks.
(No room on player's ship)You don't have enough room on your ship right now.
(NPC wants to leave ship)Drop me off at the nearest station.
(Player receives licence)Congratulations on your new licence.
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)If you're looking to find some black market merchandise, I'm the one to talk to.
(Friendly greeting)It's good to see you, friend.
(Allied greeting)It's an honour to see you here.
(Start of greeting)On behalf of our organisation: (keep space)
We need to damage the target further.
(to marine)Alright, get out of there. Abort.
(boarding pod launched)Pod launched. Moving to target.
(begin breach)We're making our way through the hull.

One of the teams is pinned down.
(lots of fighting noise)We're taking heavy losses.

The commander is dead. We will resist to the last!
I have a team working on bypassing a lockdown.
The crew seems to be abandoning ship.

I'm calling it. Abort! Get back to your pods!

(target damaged)Don't destroy the target while we're in here!
(emergency event mission offer)I could really use some help right now.
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)I'm taking a big risk by broadcasting, so if you decode this transmission, keep it to yourself. I have work that needs doing.
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone hear me?! Hello?! I'm not supposed to be broadcasting but I need help! Please! I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone here me?! I need help! Please, if you can hear this, I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help)Hey! I know this is unconventional, but if you can hear this, I could use some help.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Don't let them get away!
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal cargo on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal wares on drone detected.

(player looks at offer - generic)Are you interested in a job?
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)You shouldn't have any trouble with this.
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)You'll need your wits about you for this.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)You decrypted my signal. Good.
(player looks at illegal mission offer)This could be lucrative for both of us.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)I'm glad you found my signal.
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)I hope you can help!
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)So you're still interested?
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)I knew you wouldn't resist.
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)You came back? Does that mean you'll help?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)Contrary to my recommendations, you have been invited to join our next operation. So?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)Your pilots will no doubt need my assistance. I accept your offfer.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)I can no longer store these things safely. Will you buy them from me?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)We have a deal. My usual location on this station is where you will find me.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)Here are the coordinates. There is a lockbox there which contains the items.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)Do not try to hurry me. I will collect them when I am ready.
(player declines mission offer)Come and find me if you change your mind.
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)Ah... you'll be back. I'm sure.
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)What?! No! Please!
(player accepts mission offer)I knew I could count on you.
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)Alright. If you think you can handle it.
(player accepts illegal opportunity)Smart move. Don't mess this up.
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)Thank you! Good luck!
(mission update)There's been a change of plans with the job.
(partial success)If that's the best you could do... sure.
(failed mission)I hope you don't think you're being paid for that.
(success in mission chain)We're one step closer to completion.
(failure in mission chain)That didn't go well, but we might still be able to salvage this.

(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)Get us out of here!
(chosen reward)Please take one of these as thanks.
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)Is this supposed to be a joke?
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)I will not surrender to a lowerlife.
(informing player)I was asked to drop my cargo.
(informing player)I was forced to drop my cargo.
We need to perform a transfer.
(first warning - generic)We cannot tolerate your actions.
(first warning to an attacking ship)Stop your attack immediately.
(warning of consequences - generic)You will now suffer the consequences.
(warning of consequences - opening fire)You are now being targeted.
(warning of consequences - sending ships)Ships are now being dispatched.
(warning of consequences - reporting)You will now be reported to local security forces.
(report of attack - ships)Reporting an attack against this vessel.
(report of attack - stations)Reporting an attack against this station.
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)Criminal record has been updated.
(report of attack generic)Reporting a criminal offence.
(variant)(ship complies to police instructions)You have done the right thing, pilot.
(ship does not comply)You have refused to comply.
(reporting)This is sector security reporting criminal activity.
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)Sector security may be in the area. Take care.
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)We have been uncovered. What do you expect us to do now?
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)Dispose of the cargo!
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)These fools are easy to direct.
(report on enemy activity)Too risky to engage.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We were hit.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)Something hit us.
(capital or m-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We're taking hits.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)They will be no match for us.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)They will not survive much longer.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Continue to attack the target.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Keep up the pressure on the target.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Give them no response.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)They are close to destruction.
(variant)(retaliation)You will now suffer the consequences of your actions.
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Show me the light!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Take me away from here!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)I pray for my life!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Enough! No!
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)You are no match for me.
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)You can expect to die soon.
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)I do not want to die!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Spare our lives, please!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)You do not want our deaths on your conscience. Stop!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Allow me to live!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)My ship has failed me. Please stop.
(fleeing from combat)Enough of this. I will take my leave!
(pilot bailing from ship)Miserable wretch! Abandoning my vessel.
(relief line)I feel blessed that I survived.
(congratulations after combat from captain)Well done, everyone!
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)We have new attack orders.
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)New attack orders!
(preparing new attack orders)Prepare to open fire on the target.
(preparing new attack orders during combat)Attack this target!
(reaction to friendly fire)Hey, will you stop firing?
(reaction to friendly fire)You're wrecking my shields!
(reaction to friendly fire)Why are you shooting me?
(enemy ship or station exploding)It's going to blow!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)You are even more foolish than I thought.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)That was a particularly pathetic attempt.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)That was inadequate.
(variant)(enemy destroyed - report)I have eliminated the target.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)You will regret your aggression, if you live.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)That was a grave mistake.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)Not enough? Then we will provide more.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Your aggression against superior firepower was unwise.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Be still and accept your death.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)You are doomed.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)I will not rise to your feeble insults.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Was that an attempt to threaten me?
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)You cannot intimidate me so easily.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)I remain unimpressed.
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)Certainly not!
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)I cannot be held responsible for your poor positioning.
(variant)(taunt - silent enemy)I will strike you down!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)This cursed machine that dares to hit me will be obliterated
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)Your firepower is insufficient.
(variant)(torpedo use)A torpedo will be decisive at this time.
(variant)(losing an enemy)I am weary of this nuisance.
(variant)(losing an enemy)Enough of this! I will shake them off.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)You will soon recognise your own inferiority.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)Your feeble attempts do not concern me
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)What you have felt is only the start.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Your annihilation is inevitable.
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)It would benefit you to come to a deal with me.
(variant)(NPC bribe succeeds)That was a good decision.
(variant)(NPC hired)I accept your offer of employment.
Last order could not be completed.
(order added to queue - informal)It's been added to the list.
The order might take longer than expected.
Pass on new coordinates to following ships.
Inform me when all ships have arrived.
All ships have arrived at destination.
(command)Tell group leader we've spotted enemy activity.
(relay report)They say it's safe to engage.
(relay report)They say it's too risky to engage.
One of our wingmen is asking for backup.
(escort leaves)You're on your own from here.
(grateful)Might not have made it without you.
(during combat)Get on the line! We need backup, now!
(group of small ships - winning)We're all over them!
(group of small ships - winning)We've got them now!
(group of small ships - losing)They're all over us!
(group of small ships - losing)We can't stand this.
(response to distress call - singular)Hang on! I'm on my way!
(response to distress call - plural)We've received your call. We're on the way.
Please follow directions to designated docking position.
They've marked our docking position for us.
Get the crew to ready a docking bay.
It's an honour to have you aboard.
We're pleased to welcome you aboard.
(Informing player ship will soon undock)The ship will be undocking soon.
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)I'll wait for you to tell me to take off.
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)Let me know when you want to take off.
There's a ship preparing to undock.
Departing ship, you are clear to undock. Safe travels.
Bring away from the docking position. Slowly.
Use these criteria for the search.
I've found a trade offer matching our criteria.
Tell that station we are on our way.
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)Which ship needs the work?
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)It is over here.
(variant)(fluff - completed upgrade / repair)My work here is done.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)This will soon be finished.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)I will accept another task now.
(order for new units)Let's make an order for new units.
(order for new ammo)Let's make an order for some more ammunition.
(cap ship repair)Ask the station to start repairs.
(cap ship / station repair)Launching repair units now.
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)This is sector security.
(ship scan warning - cargo)Please halt. We will be scanning your cargo hold.
(ship scan warning - inventory)Please halt. We will be scanning your inventory.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)Your scan shows nothing of concern.
(ship scan result - something found)We've detected contraband.
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)Release your contraband immediately.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)I will submit to your scan, this once.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)Of course you did not find anything.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)I am not responsible for this cargo.
(variant)(ship scanned - illegal)I did not authorise you to scan!
(report to superior)My ship is being scanned.
(variant)(ship scan warning)I will take my pick from your cargo bay.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)Your cargo bay appears to be empty.
(variant)(ship scan result)Your cargo is of interest. I may keep it.
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)The cargo is yours.
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)My ship. It is yours now.
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)I'm noticing a small breach. It looks like someone used explosives on the hull.
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)Electronics have gone dead somewhere. Someone used an EMP device.
(station / ship hacked)It looks like someone's hacked us.
(station security saw suspicious activity)We've picked up suspicious activity.
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)Security vessels are reporting suspicious activity.
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Send out additional security vessels.
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Launch emergency fighters.
Make sure service crew know to fix the damage.
(call to security forces - minor)Look out for any suspicious activity.
(call to security forces - major)Tell us of any suspicious activity immediately.
(call to security forces - search)Scan for suspicious activity.
Look only for our target resource.
(NPC moves onto player's ship)I'm aboard your ship and ready to go.
(NPC moves off player ship)The journey was not unpleasant. You have my thanks.
(No room on player's ship)You don't have enough room on your ship right now.
(NPC wants to leave ship)Drop me off at the nearest station.
(Player receives licence)Congratulations on your new licence.
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)If you're looking to find some black market merchandise, I'm the one to talk to.
(Friendly greeting)It's good to see you, friend.
(Allied greeting)It's an honour to see you here.
(Start of greeting)On behalf of our organisation: (keep space)
We need to damage the target further.
(to marine)Alright, get out of there. Abort.
(boarding pod launched)Pod launched. Moving to target.
(begin breach)We're making our way through the hull.
(marine lost during breach)Man down! Watch out for countermeasures on the hull!
One of the teams is pinned down.
(lots of fighting noise)We're taking heavy losses.
(lots of fighting noise)We're pushing through. Lots of resistance.
We've secured several sections. Moving on.
The commander is dead. We will resist to the last!
I have a team working on bypassing a lockdown.
The crew seems to be abandoning ship.
The self-destruct has been activated. We're working on disabling it.
I don't think we can make it to the bridge. Requesting abort.
I'm calling it. Abort! Get back to your pods!
(self-destruct imminent, somber)Sorry, Sir. This isn't looking good.
(target damaged)Don't destroy the target while we're in here!
(emergency event mission offer)I could really use some help right now.
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)I'm taking a big risk by broadcasting, so if you decode this transmission, keep it to yourself. I have work that needs doing.
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone hear me?! Hello?! I'm not supposed to be broadcasting but I need help! Please! I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone here me?! I need help! Please, if you can hear this, I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help)Hey! I know this is unconventional, but if you can hear this, I could use some help.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Don't let them get away!
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal cargo on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal wares on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal data on drone detected.
(player looks at offer - generic)Are you interested in a job?
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)You shouldn't have any trouble with this.
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)You'll need your wits about you for this.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)You decrypted my signal. Good.
(player looks at illegal mission offer)This could be lucrative for both of us.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)I'm glad you found my signal.
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)I hope you can help!
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)So you're still interested?
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)I knew you wouldn't resist.
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)You came back? Does that mean you'll help?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)I have reluctantly agreed to offer you a place on our next sortie. Will you join?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)Yes. I will be ready by the time you manage to assemble your other pilots.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)Will you buy these? I must get rid of them.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)Yes, yes. We will make the arrangements at my usual location.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)Go to these coordinates and find the lockbox. The items are inside it.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)I will collect them, but not before I have concluded some other business.
(player declines mission offer)Come and find me if you change your mind.
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)Ah... you'll be back. I'm sure.
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)What?! No! Please!
(player accepts mission offer)I knew I could count on you.
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)Alright. If you think you can handle it.
(player accepts illegal opportunity)Smart move. Don't mess this up.
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)Thank you! Good luck!
(mission update)There's been a change of plans with the job.
(partial success)If that's the best you could do... sure.
(failed mission)I hope you don't think you're being paid for that.
(success in mission chain)We're one step closer to completion.
(failure in mission chain)That didn't go well, but we might still be able to salvage this.
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)Sorry. Looks like your services are no longer required.
My position among the Holy Order gives me authority to judge and enact our military strategies against the pitiful wretches of the Godrealm. I also shall pass judgement upon you.
Your being here means that you have gained recognition as a worthy friend of the Holy Order.
Your being here means that you have gained recognition as a true champion of the Holy Order.
There will always be place for pilots willing to represent our cause.
This conflict is one the likes of which the cosmos has never seen. Only fellow Paranid can stand against us so.
Because of this, we will not risk any passing pilot tarnishing our path to victory. You must undergo a trial.
And yes, we are accommodating enough to give lesser races the opportunity to aid us.
I have much to do so I propose that we begin.
You will be granted the choice of many tasks, from combat deployments to construction work. What is available will depend on the current situation in the area.
You will be paid as you complete your allotted tasks, and we may see fit to reward you further at the conclusion.
It is rare for one such as yourself to be so interested in Paranid matters. Rarer still for us to indulge. Very well.
It is a shameful story. Our once proud Paranid race has been humiliated before all of the lesser races. A 'civil-war' they call it.
The 'Godrealm' believe themselves bathed in holy light when they are in-fact blinded by it. They can not fathom that their false Pontifex has been surpassed; a natural reaction I suppose.
Unfortunately, we must do what we can to silence those who speak against the true Pontifex, even if they were once brethren. They will abandon their ways and join us or they will be cast aside.
And let us not forget the damnable Argon, those whom our fellow Paranid have run to for aid.
'Tis no matter. Our cause is just and our strength is unmatched.
Very well. I will select a suitable task for you momentarily.
I trust you will not disappoint us.
You will now find tasks related to our conflict with the 'Godrealm' in your mission interface.
There are currently no open tasks.
We will not simply have anyone interfere in Holy Order matters. Do not bother us unless you have proven yourself worthy.
We are still passing judgement on your previous performance. Begone.
Do not forget that you are representing our glorious order. Do not bring us shame.
We do not currently deem you worthy of aiding us in our cause.
Your performance during your last assignment was pitiful. I do not believe we need to discuss this any further.
Should you improve yourself, you may yet get a chance to aid us.
The resplendent Holy Order seeks a number of skilful pilots to join us in defending our space from the heretics of the Godrealm.
This is a vital operation. Those taking part must remain sound of mind.
Our goals are to defend our borders from the Godrealm and continue to push into their space in the name of the true Pontifex. If you are worthy, join us.
(briefing status - optimistic)Our recent efforts against the Godrealm are going as we expected.
(briefing status - optimistic)After several recent encounters with the Godrealm forces, we clearly prevailed.
(briefing status - optimistic)Due to our efforts, Godrealm forces have been greatly reduced.
(briefing status - optimistic)We have pushed the Godrealm to the brink and now they cower behind their defences.
(briefing status - optimistic)We have won many of the engagements with the Godrealm forces. We expect it to continue.
(briefing status - optimistic)The Paranid of the Godrealm must feel great shame at this time. They have suffered much at our hand.
(briefing status - pessimistic)The gains we had previously achieved have been eroded by the Godrealm forces.
(briefing status - pessimistic)It seems that our enemy is still capable of employing intelligence worthy of a Paranid.
(briefing status - pessimistic)The Goldreamn continues to push us, backed by a number of lesser species. A revolting turn.
(briefing status - pessimistic)While we have lost ground to the Godrealm, we expect our alternative strategies shall soon confound them.
(briefing status - pessimistic)It seems we have given the Godrealm opportunity to expand their forces. It will not last.
(briefing status - pessimistic)Our recent efforts against the Godrealm were poorly formulated.
(briefing status - instruction)Take notice of these instructions and judge where you can best assist.
(briefing status - instruction)Study these options and select a task that best suits your abilities.
(briefing status - instruction)View what tasks need completing and judge what suits your skills.
(briefing status - instruction)Take a look at these directives before deciding how you can help us.
(briefing status - instruction)Look through our current objectives and select an area in which you can aid us.
(briefing status - thanks)We thank you for your help in this conflict.
(briefing status - thanks)The Holy Order of the true Pontifex thanks you for your help.
(briefing status - thanks)Very good. We shall not lose with aid from those such as you.

page.title: Split NPC Male 1 / Split 1 rep / Misc Plot Characters
page.descr: Lines for Split NPC Male 1 and Miscellaneous story characters using that voice
page.t: (Goodbye - staff)Glad to have been of assistance.
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)We have nothing to say to you.

The request came from a police vessel.

(variant)(refusal to do something)Split not do this.
(chosen reward)Please take one of these as thanks.

(informing player)I was asked to drop my cargo.

(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)Enemy show weakness already!
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Continue to attack the target.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Keep up the pressure on the target.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Not reply!
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Keep shooting! They die soon.
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Send help!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Split want to leave now.
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)This not good.
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)You no match for Split!
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Split ask you to stop!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Split ask for mercy!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Ship almost destroyed. You stop now please?
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Split finished. Spare life!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)No more! Split not want to die.
(fleeing from combat)No more! Split make haste!
(pilot bailing from ship)Split eject! Spare life!
(congratulations after combat from captain)Well done, everyone!
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)We have new attack orders.
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)New attack orders!
