(reaction to friendly fire)Hey, will you stop firing?
(reaction to friendly fire)You're wrecking my shields!
(reaction to friendly fire)Why are you shooting me?
(enemy ship or station exploding)It's going to blow!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)That not good shooting! Split laugh.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)That shot not much good.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)You have to hit Split more than that!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)Split make you pay for that!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)You make big mistake.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)Want more? OK.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)You too puny. You not survive.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Stay still! Split make it quick.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)You die now!
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Split not afraid.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)You think you better than Split? Funny.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Split show you now!
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)You not impress Split.
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)No way!
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)Split apologise! Both be more careful next time.
(variant)(taunt - xenon)Machine behave badly. Split switch it off.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)This machine fight well!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)Split not die so easily!
(variant)(losing an enemy)Split need more space to fight!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)That not hurt Split.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)That pretty bad shooting!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)Split only started!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Prepare for honourable death!
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)You want to make deal with Split?
(variant)(NPC hired)Split try best. Serve you well.
(variant)(NPC fired)Never mind. Split work somewhere else.

(variant)(ship scanned - illegal)You stop! That not allowed!

(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)I have a profitable proposition for you.
(variant)(NPC bribe succeeds)Good. We will make profit together.
(variant)(NPC hired)I will do my best to maximise your company's profits.
(variant)(NPC fired)I wish your company good profits nevertheless.
Last order could not be completed.
(order added to queue - informal)It's been added to the list.
The order might take longer than expected.
Pass on new coordinates to following ships.
Inform me when all ships have arrived.
All ships have arrived at destination.
(command)Tell group leader we've spotted enemy activity.
(relay report)They say it's safe to engage.

One of our wingmen is asking for backup.
(escort leaves)You're on your own from here.
(grateful)Might not have made it without you.
(during combat)Get on the line! We need backup, now!
(group of small ships - winning)We're all over them!
(group of small ships - winning)We've got them now!
(group of small ships - losing)They're all over us!
(group of small ships - losing)We can't stand this.
(response to distress call - singular)Hang on! I'm on my way!
(response to distress call - plural)We've received your call. We're on the way.
Please follow directions to designated docking position.
They've marked our docking position for us.
Get the crew to ready a docking bay.
It's an honour to have you aboard.
We're pleased to welcome you aboard.

Bring away from the docking position. Slowly.

Tell that station we are on our way.

(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)This way, maybe.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)What should I do now?
(order for new units)Let's make an order for new units.
(order for new ammo)Let's make an order for some more ammunition.
(cap ship repair)Ask the station to start repairs.
(cap ship / station repair)Launching repair units now.
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)This is sector security.
(ship scan warning - cargo)Please halt. We will be scanning your cargo hold.
(ship scan warning - inventory)Please halt. We will be scanning your inventory.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)Your scan is clean. Profit well.
(ship scan result - something found)We've detected contraband.
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)Release your contraband immediately.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)Yes, you can scan.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)Yes! Anything else would be bad for business.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)What I carry is my business!
(variant)(ship scanned - illegal)Stop! This is not acceptable.
(report to superior)My ship is being scanned.
(variant)(ship scan warning)Let us take a look at your cargo.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)Nothing? This cannot be profitable!
(variant)(ship scan result)This cargo will be profitable for me.
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)Take my cargo, and my profits!
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)My ship is yours, I suppose!
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)I'm noticing a small breach. It looks like someone used explosives on the hull.
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)Electronics have gone dead somewhere. Someone used an EMP device.
(station / ship hacked)It looks like someone's hacked us.
(station security saw suspicious activity)We've picked up suspicious activity.
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)Security vessels are reporting suspicious activity.
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Send out additional security vessels.
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Launch emergency fighters.
Make sure service crew know to fix the damage.
(call to security forces - minor)Look out for any suspicious activity.
(call to security forces - major)Tell us of any suspicious activity immediately.
(call to security forces - search)Scan for suspicious activity.
Look only for our target resource.
(NPC moves onto player's ship)I'm aboard your ship and ready to go.
(NPC moves off player ship)Thanks for the ride. See you around.

(NPC wants to leave ship)Drop me off at the nearest station.
(Player receives licence)Congratulations on your new licence.
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)If you're looking to find some black market merchandise, I'm the one to talk to.
(Friendly greeting)It's good to see you, friend.
(Allied greeting)It's an honour to see you here.
(Promotion ceremony - intro)I am pleased to engage with you face to face.
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, friendly)We've been watching your actions with great interest and believe you are worth investing in.
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, allied)We're happy that our previous interest in you was not unfounded. You have performed well enough to be rewarded.
(Promotion ceremony - handing over 'medal', friendly)I'm pleased to present you with a new rank amongst our company.
(Promotion ceremony - handing over 'medal', allied)It's an honour to present you with a new rank amongst our company.
(Promotion ceremony)Of course, this rank comes with great benefits.
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 1)These benefits are tied to the rank, so if you lose the rank, the benefits go too.
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 2)But with your record and our trust, I'm sure we don't have to worry about that.
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 3)I hope you find these rewards fitting to the work you've done. May they bring you profit.
(Promotion ceremony - subgroup licence hint)Given your elevation, you may also find opportunities in a number of organisations under our administration. They may be worth your attention.
(Promotion ceremony - outro)Once again, I give thanks for your efforts.
(Promotion ceremony - outro cntd)We look forward to continuing our partnership in the future.
(Start of greeting)On behalf of our organisation: (keep space)
We need to damage the target further.
(to marine)Alright, get out of there. Abort.
(on failure, somber)Our loss today is insurmountable.
(boarding pod launched)Pod launched. Moving to target.
(begin breach)We're making our way through the hull.
(marine lost during breach)Man down! Watch out for countermeasures on the hull!
One of the teams is pinned down.
(lots of fighting noise)We're taking heavy losses.
(lots of fighting noise)We're pushing through. Lots of resistance.
We've secured several sections. Moving on.
The commander is dead. Our defence is cracking.
I have a team working on bypassing a lockdown.
The crew seems to be abandoning ship.
The self-destruct has been activated. We're working on disabling it.
I don't think we can make it to the bridge. Requesting abort.
I'm calling it. Abort! Get back to your pods!
(self-destruct imminent, somber)Sorry, Sir. This isn't looking good.
(target damaged)Don't destroy the target while we're in here!
(emergency event mission offer)I could really use some help right now.
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)I'm taking a big risk by broadcasting, so if you decode this transmission, keep it to yourself. I have work that needs doing.
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone hear me?! Hello?! I'm not supposed to be broadcasting but I need help! Please! I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone here me?! I need help! Please, if you can hear this, I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help)Hey! I know this is unconventional, but if you can hear this, I could use some help.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Don't let them get away!
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal cargo on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal wares on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal data on drone detected.
(player looks at offer - generic)Are you interested in a job?
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)You shouldn't have any trouble with this.
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)You'll need your wits about you for this.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)You decrypted my signal. Good.
(player looks at illegal mission offer)This could be lucrative for both of us.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)I'm glad you found my signal.
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)I hope you can help!
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)So you're still interested?
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)I knew you wouldn't resist.
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)You came back? Does that mean you'll help?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)Will you come with us? We seek opportunities and will leave soon.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)I will come. It sounds like there could be many profits in this.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)These items have much profit potential but I cannot risk keeping them. Would you like to make a deal?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)Yes, let us make a deal. Come to my usual place on this station.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)There is a lockbox with the items in it at these coordinates.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)I will fetch them as soon as possible.
(player declines mission offer)Come and find me if you change your mind.
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)Ah... you'll be back. I'm sure.
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)What?! No! Please!
(player accepts mission offer)I knew I could count on you.
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)Alright. If you think you can handle it.
(player accepts illegal opportunity)Smart move. Don't mess this up.
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)Thank you! Good luck!
(mission update)There's been a change of plans with the job.
(partial success)If that's the best you could do... sure.
(failed mission)I hope you don't think you're being paid for that.
(success in mission chain)We're one step closer to completion.
(failure in mission chain)That didn't go well, but we might still be able to salvage this.
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)Sorry. Looks like your services are no longer required.

page.title: Teladi NPC 2 / Ministry rep
page.descr: Lines for Teladi NPC 2
page.t: (Metadata, do not translate)[teladi] male female basic
(Goodbye - staff)Glad to have been of assistance.
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)We have nothing to say to you.
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
The request came from a police vessel.
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)Get us out of here!
(variant)(refusal to do something)No, this is not good for business.
(chosen reward)Please take one of these as thanks.
Sorry, I am busy right now.
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)You cannot be serious with this request?
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)I will not give in so easily!
(informing player)I was asked to drop my cargo.
(informing player)I was forced to drop my cargo.
We need to perform a transfer.
(first warning - generic)We cannot tolerate your actions.
(first warning to an attacking ship)Stop your attack immediately.
(warning of consequences - generic)You will now suffer the consequences.
(warning of consequences - opening fire)You are now being targeted.
(warning of consequences - sending ships)Ships are now being dispatched.
(warning of consequences - reporting)You will now be reported to local security forces.
(report of attack - ships)Reporting an attack against this vessel.
(report of attack - stations)Reporting an attack against this station.
(law enforcement confirms report, after something like Affirmative)Criminal record has been updated.
(report of attack generic)Reporting a criminal offence.
(variant)(ship complies to police instructions)This was the right choice.
(ship does not comply)You have refused to comply.
(reporting)This is sector security reporting criminal activity.
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship)Be cautious. Sector security may be searching the area.
(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)Security have found us! What next?
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)Eject it into space!
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)It is always nice to make profits so simply!
(report on enemy activity)Too risky to engage.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We were hit.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)Something hit us.
(capital or m-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We're taking hits.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)Let us show them our strength!
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)Their defences cannot stop us.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Continue to attack the target.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Keep up the pressure on the target.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Let them hear silence!
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)They will find no profit in being destroyed!
(variant)(retaliation)Strike our operations and we will strike yours!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Help me!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)My profits!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Please, stop!
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)This will be bad news for you!
(variant)(taunt line - generic)The profits will be mine!
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Please spare me!
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Let me survive!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)We ask you to spare us!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Our ship is in bad shape! Spare us!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Let me live, please!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Please, no more.
(pilot bailing from ship)I trade my vessel for my life!
(relief line)I am relieved that I survived.
(congratulations after combat from captain)Well done, everyone!
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)We have new attack orders.
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)New attack orders!
(preparing new attack orders)Prepare to open fire on the target.
(preparing new attack orders during combat)Attack this target!
(reaction to friendly fire)Hey, will you stop firing?
(reaction to friendly fire)You're wrecking my shields!
(reaction to friendly fire)Why are you shooting me?
(enemy ship or station exploding)It's going to blow!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)That is not very impressive. Is it your best effort?
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)You cannot reduce my profits so easily.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)You will need to do much more than that.
(variant)(enemy destroyed - taunt)Time to close your account.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)You will make no profits this way, pilot.
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)You have made a mistake.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)More? Yes, yes, we have more.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)This should be simple.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Your loss will be swift.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)This is the end for you!
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)I think not.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Do not make empty threats!
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)You do not scare me!
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Is that the best you can offer?
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)No chance!
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)I apologise. This was not meant to hit you.
(variant)(taunt - xenon)I will reduce you to nuts and bolts!
(variant)(taunt - silent enemy)Time to go back to the egg you came from!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)A machine should not be able to shoot so well.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)I am made of stronger stuff than that.
(variant)(threat)This is better than anything you can do!
(variant)(torpedo use)So, let me try this torpedo.
(variant)(losing an enemy)Get this away from me!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)You hit like a hatchling!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)I can manage this!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)I have only just started.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)Your ship will soon be space dust!
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)I have a little... business proposition.
(variant)(NPC bribe succeeds)I am so glad we can do business together.
(variant)(NPC bribe fails)Oh well, it is your choice.
(variant)(NPC hired)Thank you. I am sure I have a lot to offer you and your company.
(variant)(NPC fired)I see. Then I will make my profit with someone else.
Last order could not be completed.
(order added to queue - informal)It's been added to the list.
The order might take longer than expected.
Pass on new coordinates to following ships.
Inform me when all ships have arrived.
All ships have arrived at destination.
(command)Tell group leader we've spotted enemy activity.
(relay report)They say it's safe to engage.

One of our wingmen is asking for backup.
(escort leaves)You're on your own from here.
(grateful)Might not have made it without you.
(during combat)Get on the line! We need backup, now!
(group of small ships - winning)We're all over them!
(group of small ships - winning)We've got them now!
(group of small ships - losing)They're all over us!
(group of small ships - losing)We can't stand this.
(response to distress call - singular)Hang on! I'm on my way!
(response to distress call - plural)We've received your call. We're on the way.
Please follow directions to designated docking position.
They've marked our docking position for us.
Get the crew to ready a docking bay.
It's an honour to have you aboard.
We're pleased to welcome you aboard.
(Informing player ship will soon undock)The ship will be undocking soon.
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)I'll wait for you to tell me to take off.
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)Let me know when you want to take off.
There's a ship preparing to undock.
Departing ship, you are clear to undock. Safe travels.
Bring away from the docking position. Slowly.
Use these criteria for the search.
I've found a trade offer matching our criteria.
Tell that station we are on our way.
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)Which ship needs the work?
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)Is this where I left it?
(variant)(fluff - completed upgrade / repair)I have finished it.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)This is nearly finished.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)How can I maximise your profit now?
(order for new units)Let's make an order for new units.
(order for new ammo)Let's make an order for some more ammunition.
(cap ship repair)Ask the station to start repairs.
(cap ship / station repair)Launching repair units now.
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)This is sector security.
(ship scan warning - cargo)Please halt. We will be scanning your cargo hold.
(ship scan warning - inventory)Please halt. We will be scanning your inventory.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)A clean scan. Good.
(ship scan result - something found)We've detected contraband.
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)Release your contraband immediately.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)You are free to scan.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)Of course!
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)Such a pity. I was going to make good profits from that.
(report to superior)My ship is being scanned.
(variant)(ship scan warning)I will just take a look inside your cargo bay.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)It is a great pity that it is empty!
(variant)(ship scan result)There is much profit in this cargo, for me at least.
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)Take it, lossmaker!
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)Take my ship then, eggbreaker!
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)I'm noticing a small breach. It looks like someone used explosives on the hull.
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)Electronics have gone dead somewhere. Someone used an EMP device.
(station / ship hacked)It looks like someone's hacked us.
(station security saw suspicious activity)We've picked up suspicious activity.
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)Security vessels are reporting suspicious activity.
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Send out additional security vessels.
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Launch emergency fighters.
Make sure service crew know to fix the damage.
(call to security forces - minor)Look out for any suspicious activity.
(call to security forces - major)Tell us of any suspicious activity immediately.
(call to security forces - search)Scan for suspicious activity.
Look only for our target resource.
(NPC moves onto player's ship)I'm aboard your ship and ready to go.
(NPC moves off player ship)Thanks for the ride. See you around.
(No room on player's ship)You don't have enough room on your ship right now.
(NPC wants to leave ship)Drop me off at the nearest station.
(Player receives licence)Congratulations on your new licence.
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)If you're looking to find some black market merchandise, I'm the one to talk to.
(Friendly greeting)It's good to see you, friend.
(Allied greeting)It's an honour to see you here.
(Promotion ceremony - intro)You are wise to come in person.
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, friendly)Under our watchful gaze, we have identified you as someone worth approaching to express our gratitude.
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, allied)Your continued service has brought nothing but pride to your peers, myself included. We wish to recognise your efforts with something noteworthy.
(Promotion ceremony - handing over 'medal', friendly)I'm pleased to present you with a new rank amongst The Ministry.
(Promotion ceremony - handing over 'medal', allied)It's an honour to present you with a new rank amongst The Ministry.
(Promotion ceremony)As you can expect, this rank comes with great benefits.
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 1)These benefits are tied to the rank. Should you turn against The Ministry, you will not only lose such benefits but any goodwill.
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 2)With your record, I am confident to say, that is not to be the case.
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 3)We hope you find these rewards fitting for the work you've done. Be proud and profitable.
(Promotion ceremony - subgroup licence hint)In addition, you may also find that certain organisations under our jurisdiction now have interest in you joining their ranks.
(Promotion ceremony - outro)Once again, I thank you for your service.
(Promotion ceremony - outro cntd)We look forward to working with you more in the future.
(Start of greeting)On behalf of our organisation: (keep space)
We need to damage the target further.
(to marine)Alright, get out of there. Abort.
(on failure, somber)Our loss today is insurmountable.
(boarding pod launched)Pod launched. Moving to target.
(begin breach)We're making our way through the hull.
(marine lost during breach)Man down! Watch out for countermeasures on the hull!
One of the teams is pinned down.
(lots of fighting noise)We're taking heavy losses.
(lots of fighting noise)We're pushing through. Lots of resistance.
We've secured several sections. Moving on.
The commander is dead. Our defence is cracking.
I have a team working on bypassing a lockdown.
The crew seems to be abandoning ship.
The self-destruct has been activated. We're working on disabling it.
I don't think we can make it to the bridge. Requesting abort.
I'm calling it. Abort! Get back to your pods!
(self-destruct imminent, somber)Sorry, Sir. This isn't looking good.
(target damaged)Don't destroy the target while we're in here!
(emergency event mission offer)I could really use some help right now.
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)I'm taking a big risk by broadcasting, so if you decode this transmission, keep it to yourself. I have work that needs doing.
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone hear me?! Hello?! I'm not supposed to be broadcasting but I need help! Please! I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone here me?! I need help! Please, if you can hear this, I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help)Hey! I know this is unconventional, but if you can hear this, I could use some help.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Don't let them get away!
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal cargo on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal wares on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal data on drone detected.
(player looks at offer - generic)Are you interested in a job?
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)You shouldn't have any trouble with this.
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)You'll need your wits about you for this.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)You decrypted my signal. Good.
(player looks at illegal mission offer)This could be lucrative for both of us.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)I'm glad you found my signal.
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)I hope you can help!
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)So you're still interested?
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)I knew you wouldn't resist.
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)You came back? Does that mean you'll help?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)Will you join us this time? We are seeking new opportunities for ...business.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)I will join your enterprise. The risks may be high, but so are the potential profits.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)These are high-risk items but there is profit in them. Can we come to a deal?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)I think a deal is possible. You will find me in my usual place on this station.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)There is a lockbox containing the items at these coordinates nearby.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)I will collect them as soon as my other business is finished.
(player declines mission offer)Come and find me if you change your mind.
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)Ah... you'll be back. I'm sure.
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)What?! No! Please!
(player accepts mission offer)I knew I could count on you.
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)Alright. If you think you can handle it.
(player accepts illegal opportunity)Smart move. Don't mess this up.
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)Thank you! Good luck!
(mission update)There's been a change of plans with the job.
(partial success)If that's the best you could do... sure.
(failed mission)I hope you don't think you're being paid for that.
(success in mission chain)We're one step closer to completion.
(failure in mission chain)That didn't go well, but we might still be able to salvage this.
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)Sorry. Looks like your services are no longer required.

(ship does not comply)You have refused to comply.
(reporting)This is sector security reporting criminal activity.

(variant)(aboard a smuggling multi-crew ship that is caught)We have been exposed. What should we do?
(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)Dispose of the cargo!
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)I am so pleased you decided to make this easy.
(report on enemy activity)Too risky to engage.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We were hit.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)Something hit us.
(capital or m-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We're taking hits.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)We will profit from their weakness.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)They will soon be out of business!
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Continue to attack the target.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Keep up the pressure on the target.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Send them no answer.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Close their account!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)This is not good!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Someone rescue me!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)This is so unpleasant!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Stop this!
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)Even a hatchling could defeat you!
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)Your future balance sheet is not looking good!
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Show mercy, please!
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Please do not shoot!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Please spare us!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Our ship is almost lost! Spare us!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Spare my scales, please!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)I do not want to die like this! Please let me live!
(pilot bailing from ship)I trade my vessel for my life!
(relief line)I am relieved that I survived.
(congratulations after combat from captain)Well done, everyone!
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in)We have new attack orders.
(new attack orders for multi-crew ship coming in during target)New attack orders!
(preparing new attack orders)Prepare to open fire on the target.
(preparing new attack orders during combat)Attack this target!
(reaction to friendly fire)Hey, will you stop firing?
(reaction to friendly fire)You're wrecking my shields!
(reaction to friendly fire)Why are you shooting me?
(enemy ship or station exploding)It's going to blow!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)That will not hurt me or my profits very much.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - response-capable)You will have to do better than that.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - generic)Is that the best you can do?
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)You will pay for that!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)That was a silly move!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)We will see about that!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)You do not stand a chance against us!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)I will make this quick!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Speak your last!
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)If you say so, pilot.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)You make threats beyond your means!
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)I am not afraid of you.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Your words do not impress me!
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)I do not think so!
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)I am extremely sorry! My aim was off.
(variant)(taunt - xenon)I will send you for scrap!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)This machine is starting to irritate my scales.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)You cannot destroy me that easily!
(variant)(torpedo use)Let us see what they think of a torpedo.
(variant)(losing an enemy)I need to shake them off!
(variant)(losing an enemy)Time to lose this nuisance!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)You will not achieve much like that!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)That barely scratched my scales!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)That is just the start.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)You will most certainly be destroyed.
(variant)(NPC attempts bribe)Perhaps we could maybe strike a deal?
(variant)(NPC bribe fails)That is such a pity.
(variant)(NPC hired)I will do my utmost to help maximise your profits.
(variant)(NPC fired)Then I wish you and your business good fortune.
Last order could not be completed.
(order added to queue - informal)It's been added to the list.
The order might take longer than expected.
Pass on new coordinates to following ships.
Inform me when all ships have arrived.
All ships have arrived at destination.
(command)Tell group leader we've spotted enemy activity.
(relay report)They say it's safe to engage.
(relay report)They say it's too risky to engage.
One of our wingmen is asking for backup.
(escort leaves)You're on your own from here.
(grateful)Might not have made it without you.
(during combat)Get on the line! We need backup, now!
(group of small ships - winning)We're all over them!
(group of small ships - winning)We've got them now!
(group of small ships - losing)They're all over us!
(group of small ships - losing)We can't stand this.
(response to distress call - singular)Hang on! I'm on my way!
(response to distress call - plural)We've received your call. We're on the way.
Please follow directions to designated docking position.
They've marked our docking position for us.
Get the crew to ready a docking bay.
It's an honour to have you aboard.
We're pleased to welcome you aboard.
(Informing player ship will soon undock)The ship will be undocking soon.
(Informing player ship will not undock before they return)I'll wait for you to tell me to take off.
(Informing player they will have to manually tell the pilot to take off)Let me know when you want to take off.
There's a ship preparing to undock.
Departing ship, you are clear to undock. Safe travels.
Bring away from the docking position. Slowly.
Use these criteria for the search.
I've found a trade offer matching our criteria.
Tell that station we are on our way.
(when a repair / upgrade order comes in)Which ship needs the work?
(variant)(fluff - moving from one part of the ship to another)Where is it?
(variant)(fluff - completed upgrade / repair)This is much improved.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. I)I will be ready very soon.
(variant)(fluff - finishing up pt. II)Do you have another task for me?
(order for new units)Let's make an order for new units.
(order for new ammo)Let's make an order for some more ammunition.
(cap ship repair)Ask the station to start repairs.
(cap ship / station repair)Launching repair units now.
(law enforcement respons to comms - followed up by comms greeting)This is sector security.
(ship scan warning - cargo)Please halt. We will be scanning your cargo hold.
(ship scan warning - inventory)Please halt. We will be scanning your inventory.
(variant)(ship scan result - nothing found)The scan is finished. You may continue.
(ship scan result - something found)We've detected contraband.
(ordering to drop cargo/contraband)Release your contraband immediately.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - compliant)Go ahead and scan.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - nothing found)You seem almost disappointed.
(variant)(ship scanned by police - something found)Whatever that is, it is not mine.
(variant)(ship scanned - illegal)You are not supposed to do that!
(report to superior)My ship is being scanned.
(variant)(ship scan warning)So, let us see what you have.
(variant)(ship scan result)That looks nice. I may take some.
(variant)(ordered to drop cargo - releases under duress)Take my cargo and leave me in peace.
(variant)(ordered to surrender ship - surrenders under duress)I have nothing left but my ship. Take it!
(station / ship sabotaged - explosives)I'm noticing a small breach. It looks like someone used explosives on the hull.
(station / ship sabotaged - EMP)Electronics have gone dead somewhere. Someone used an EMP device.
(station / ship hacked)It looks like someone's hacked us.
(station security saw suspicious activity)We've picked up suspicious activity.
(station security saw suspicious activity - report inside managers office)Security vessels are reporting suspicious activity.
(manager response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Send out additional security vessels.
(manager / captain response to sabotage, hacking or suspicious activity)Launch emergency fighters.
Make sure service crew know to fix the damage.
(call to security forces - minor)Look out for any suspicious activity.
(call to security forces - major)Tell us of any suspicious activity immediately.
(call to security forces - search)Scan for suspicious activity.
Look only for our target resource.
(NPC moves onto player's ship)I'm aboard your ship and ready to go.
(NPC moves off player ship)Thanks for the ride. See you around.
(No room on player's ship)You don't have enough room on your ship right now.
(NPC wants to leave ship)Drop me off at the nearest station.
(Player receives licence)Congratulations on your new licence.
(greeting - black marketeer - on introduction)(@voice confident but not drawing attention)If you're looking to find some black market merchandise, I'm the one to talk to.
(Friendly greeting)It's good to see you, friend.
(Allied greeting)It's an honour to see you here.
(Promotion ceremony - intro)You certainly are bold, approaching us in person.
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, friendly)We have had our eyes on you for some time now. You are obviously someone we can trust, which is something which must be returned in kind.
(Promotion ceremony - cntd, allied)You continue to fly alongside us, with our ideals clear in your actions. Such as the nobility of our pact. Recognition is not freely given but earned.
(Promotion ceremony - handing over 'medal', friendly)I'm pleased to present you with a new rank amongst our organisation.
(Promotion ceremony - handing over 'medal', allied)It's an honour to present you with a new rank amongst our organisation.
(Promotion ceremony)Of course, this rank comes with a number of benefits.
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 1)Should you ever turn against the pact, these benefits will be revoked, as well as any protection we have previously afforded you.
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 2)But as I am such a good judge of character, I don't see it happening. I would be hurt, and very angry.
(Promotion ceremony - fluff line to spread notifications out 3)You should find these rewards fitting to the work you've done. I hope it gives you more freedom to continue according to our creed.

(Promotion ceremony - subgroup licence hint)Keep this quiet though. You may find that certain organisations within the pact will now have interest in you joining their ranks. Keep your wits about you.
(Promotion ceremony - outro)Once again, I thank you for your efforts.
(Promotion ceremony - outro cntd)We look forward to working with you more in the future.
(Start of greeting)On behalf of our organisation: (keep space)
We need to damage the target further.
(to marine)Alright, get out of there. Abort.
(on failure, somber)Our loss today is insurmountable.
(boarding pod launched)Pod launched. Moving to target.
(begin breach)We're making our way through the hull.
(marine lost during breach)Man down! Watch out for countermeasures on the hull!
One of the teams is pinned down.
(lots of fighting noise)We're taking heavy losses.
(lots of fighting noise)We're pushing through. Lots of resistance.
We've secured several sections. Moving on.
The commander is dead. Our defence is cracking.
I have a team working on bypassing a lockdown.
The crew seems to be abandoning ship.
The self-destruct has been activated. We're working on disabling it.
I don't think we can make it to the bridge. Requesting abort.
I'm calling it. Abort! Get back to your pods!
(self-destruct imminent, somber)Sorry, Sir. This isn't looking good.
(target damaged)Don't destroy the target while we're in here!
(emergency event mission offer)I could really use some help right now.
(data leak signal - illegal opportunity)I'm taking a big risk by broadcasting, so if you decode this transmission, keep it to yourself. I have work that needs doing.
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone hear me?! Hello?! I'm not supposed to be broadcasting but I need help! Please! I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help - intense)Can anyone here me?! I need help! Please, if you can hear this, I need help!
(data leak signal - plea for help)Hey! I know this is unconventional, but if you can hear this, I could use some help.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Don't let them get away!
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal cargo on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal wares on drone detected.
(station masstraffic mini-mission)Illegal data on drone detected.
(player looks at offer - generic)Are you interested in a job?
(player looks at offer - easy difficulty)You shouldn't have any trouble with this.
(player looks at offer - hard difficulty)You'll need your wits about you for this.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - illegal opportunity)You decrypted my signal. Good.
(player looks at illegal mission offer)This could be lucrative for both of us.
(player looks at data leak mission offer - plea for help)I'm glad you found my signal.
(player looks at emergency mission offer or plea for help)I hope you can help!
(player looks at mission offer again - generic)So you're still interested?
(player looks at mission offer again - illegal opportunity)I knew you wouldn't resist.
(player looks at mission offer again - emergency or plea for help)You came back? Does that mean you'll help?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - call)We are preparing for our next enterprise. Would you like to join us?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 01 - upcoming raid - response)An interesting proposition. Yes, I will come along.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)I have some interesting goods to offer your. Would you be interested?
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - response)Yes, that does sound good. I will be where you normally find me on this station.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - call)The items will be in a lockbox at coordinates which I will provide to you.
(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 03 - lockbox - response)I will collect them as soon as I am ready.
(player declines mission offer)Come and find me if you change your mind.
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)Ah... you'll be back. I'm sure.
(player declines mission offer - plea for help)What?! No! Please!
(player accepts mission offer)I knew I could count on you.
(reluctant for player to take mission - particularly hard missions, etc)Alright. If you think you can handle it.
(player accepts illegal opportunity)Smart move. Don't mess this up.
(player accepts plea for help or emergency mission offer)Thank you! Good luck!
(mission update)There's been a change of plans with the job.
(partial success)If that's the best you could do... sure.
(failed mission)I hope you don't think you're being paid for that.
(success in mission chain)We're one step closer to completion.
(failure in mission chain)That didn't go well, but we might still be able to salvage this.
(mission aborted by NPC / script failure)Sorry. Looks like your services are no longer required.

page.t: (Metadata, do not translate)[teladi] male female basic
(Goodbye - staff)Glad to have been of assistance.
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)We have nothing to say to you.
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
The request came from a police vessel.
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)Get us out of here!
(chosen reward)Please take one of these as thanks.
Sorry, I am busy right now.

(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)I see no profit in surrendering.
(informing player)I was asked to drop my cargo.
(informing player)I was forced to drop my cargo.
We need to perform a transfer.
(first warning - generic)We cannot tolerate your actions.

(warning of consequences - generic)You will now suffer the consequences.

(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)I will not let you get away with this!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - response-capable)That was not your wisest move, pilot!

(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)We will wrap this up swiftly!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, panic - small ship)Your time is up!
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)I will not rise to your insults.
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)Are you serious?
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)You think you scare me?
(variant)(response to taunt - small ship)It will take more than that to impress me.
(variant)(response to life threat threshold - small ship)Not this time!
(variant)(apology for friendly fire)Silly me! I will try not to make that mistake again.
(variant)(taunt - xenon)I will recycle you for spare parts!
(variant)(taunt - silent enemy)You will be erased from space!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - xenon)This machine is bad for business.
(variant)(single-crew ship hit without taking serious damage - silent enemy)My defences can withstand this.
(variant)(threat)Do you think you can deal with this?
(variant)(torpedo use)A torpedo should stir things up nicely.
(variant)(losing an enemy)I must get away from this nuisance!
(variant)(losing an enemy)How do I escape this thing?
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)That shot would not even have broken an egg!
(variant)(small ship hit, not in danger - generic)That did not put much of a dent in my balance sheet!
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - small ship)I have not finshed yet, I can assure you.
(variant)(response to small ship hit, generic - big ship)You cannot possibly survive this.

(variant)(encounter offer - illegal activity 02 - black marketeer - call)It would be unfortunate if these items were to go to waste. Can you take them?

(player declines mission offer)Come and find me if you change your mind.
(player declines mission offer - illegal opportunity)Ah... you'll be back. I'm sure.

(player accepts mission offer)I knew I could count on you.

Greetings pilot. How would you like an opportunity for some extra profit? We're always looking for new blood to help us with some of our operations.
If you're interested, come find me.
I see you know a good opportunity when you see one.
We'll give you access to our job listings, for a fair price of course.
Given our reputation, I'm sure you can guess what some of the jobs will be. You'll find something worth doing.
Just don't expect to make too many friends along the way, besides us of course.
(response to 'any jobs for me?')There's always stuff to be done. Of course, we can't simply trust important tasks to just anyone though.
(reject)It is bad for business to hire people out of pity. Perhaps some other time.
Good choice. You will now be able to see jobs on offer in certain areas where we operate.
We expect good things from you.
It appears you don't have the necessary funds available. Please don't waste our time.

(Goodbye - staff)Glad to have been of assistance.
(Greeting - rejected - big ship)We have nothing to say to you.
(* Honorifics - addressing crew in calm situations *)
The request came from a police vessel.
(suggestion for dealing with bad situation)Get us out of here!
(chosen reward)Please take one of these as thanks.
Sorry, I am busy right now.
(variant)(refusal to surrender - finds it funny)Surrender? What an amusing idea.
(variant)(refusal to surrender - in danger)Surrender is not an option.
(informing player)I was asked to drop my cargo.
(informing player)I was forced to drop my cargo.
We need to perform a transfer.
(first warning - generic)We cannot tolerate your actions.
(first warning to an attacking ship)Stop your attack immediately.
(warning of consequences - generic)You will now suffer the consequences.
(warning of consequences - opening fire)You are now being targeted.
(warning of consequences - sending ships)Ships are now being dispatched.

(report of attack - ships)Reporting an attack against this vessel.

(report of attack generic)Reporting a criminal offence.

(ship does not comply)You have refused to comply.
(reporting)This is sector security reporting criminal activity.

(variant)(response to above - rushed suggestion)Just drop the cargo!
(variant)(ship complies to pirate instructions)So nice of you to keep things simple.
(report on enemy activity)Too risky to engage.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We were hit.
(capital or M-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)Something hit us.
(capital or m-sized ship / station hit without taking serious damage)We're taking hits.
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)They cannot sustain this much longer!
(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - serious threat threshold on attacked ship reached)Their defences are starting to crack.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Continue to attack the target.
(multi-crew ship attacking - captain response)Keep up the pressure on the target.

(variant)(multi-crew ship attacking - life threat threshold on attacked ship reached - captain response)Let us seal the deal!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)My scales!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Let this end!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)This is not nice!
(variant)(small ship hit, in danger, panic)Stop please!
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)Your loss will be my profit!
(variant)(taunt line - response-capable)You had better issue a profit warning!
(variant)(generic - life threat threshold reached)Do not destroy me, please!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)Oh, please spare us!
(variant)(multi-crew ship / station hit - life threat threshold reached)No more, please! Let us live!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)Let me survive!
(variant)(single-crew ship hit - life threat threshold reached)I am helpless. There is no profit in further shooting.
(pilot bailing from ship)I trade my vessel for my life!
(relief line)I am relieved that I survived.
(congratulations after combat from captain)Well done, everyone!
