page.title: Miscellaneous mission text
page.descr: Miscellaneous mission texts referenced by several sources
page.t: (Tool tip)The item must be in your possession.
Minimum plot size: $X$ x $Y$ x $Z$ km
WARNING: This is a criminal activity.
WARNING: This may be seen as a criminal activity.
We suggest to use advanced satellites, due to their larger radar range.
Failed to find ship in time
Trading is restricted to own faction
Station plot no longer matches criteria
Object was killed(by a player owned object)
Container was destroyed(by a player owned object)

page.title: Transport Passenger
page.t: I don't really have time to explain why, but I need to get off of this station as quickly as possible. People are looking for me. It doesn't matter where I go, as long as it is away from here. Are you willing to give me transport off the station? I'll pay you for it. If you can help me, land at the station and meet me on the dock area. Thank you, stranger.

I need a fast ship and a good pilot to get me away from this station as quickly as possible. Doesn't really matter where I end up, as long as no one finds me before I get there! Can I count on your help? If so, land at the station and meet me on the dock area. I'll wait for you there. Will you help me?

If you're seeing this job offer then you apparently fit the criteria of what I need. I think someone's been tailing me and the security office says it's not their problem until a crime is committed. I simply need transport to a station where I have friends.

Ok, funny story. It looks like I may have overslept here and the ship I work on has left without me. I need a fast passenger transport to catch up to the ship and drop me off. My job is on the line! Get me there fast enough and I'll throw in a bonus.

My shipmates seem to have pulled a practical joke and left me behind. I need a fast passenger transport to catch up to the ship and drop me off. If you get me there fast enough I'll also include a bonus.
Emergency call to anyone in the area! Reactor is critical and I need evacuation. The rest of the crew is already away but I can't make it to the escape pods!

page.title: Achieve Coverage
page.t: We suggest to use advanced satellites, due to their larger radar range.

We, along with many other stations, have lost a fair number of ships and good people to the Xenon. We have come together to fund a satellite network to help us coordinate our ship movements based on local threats. We are looking for you to acquire suitable satellites and cover the specified area.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

We seem to have lost the edge when it comes to keeping an eye on the local competition. We're requesting that a number of satellites be placed around a certain area of interest so that we can keep an eye on our competitors more closely, within the bounds of the law of course.\n$REQUIREMENTS$
While they may not last long, we would like the opportunity to deploy satellites and build a better picture of nearby hostile space so we can gauge the danger to our ships.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

page.title: Assassination Mission 2
page.t: I did manage to strike a deal with the mark to the tune of $REWARD$ credits.
$REWARD$ credits seem enough for me to look the other way.
(full credit)That was a very well executed job. Thank you for your time.
(partial credit)Word is that you got a bit of help during the job. Unfortuantely that means partial credit for the payment.
(partial credit)It seems the target was hit hardest by someone else and that means partial credit for the job. Hit harder and faster next time.
(no credit)That was either a very low-key operation or you hardly dented the target. I simply can't pay anyone for a job like that.
(Male)The elusive criminal %1($Target_NPC_Name$) is hoping to find shelter and avoid capture. We can't allow him to go into hiding.
(Female)The elusive criminal %1($Target_NPC_Name$) is hoping to find shelter and avoid capture. We can't allow her to go into hiding.
(Male)The cartel boss %1($Target_NPC_Name$) is currently without the bulk of his escorts. If we take him out, we destabilise their whole operation.
(Female)The cartel boss %1($Target_NPC_Name$) is currently without the bulk of her escorts. If we take her out, we destabilise their whole operation.
(Male)Our rivals at %1($Enemy_Faction$) are enjoying a bout of economic success but we could do with a shift of fortunes. Let's give them a little scare by taking out one of their area managers.
(Male)%1($Enemy_Faction$) have been growing bold and their agent %2($Target_NPC_Name$) is leading the charge in this area. Take him out.
(Female)%1($Enemy_Faction$) have been growing bold and their agent %2($Target_NPC_Name$) is leading the charge in this area. Take her out.

We're continuing to suffer losses to the Xenon ravaging this sector. We've marked a target known to be a lead vessel in their strike forces. With our forces stretched, we're asking for any assistance to help slow the Xenon down.

(Male)I have a serious problem. My business partner and I were close to closing a deal but it looks like he's gone ahead and closed it without me. I've invested so much into this, this'll ruin me. If he's taken out I may be able to salvage something.

(Female)I have a serious problem. My business partner and I were close to closing a deal but it looks like she's gone ahead and closed it without me. I've invested so much into this, this'll ruin me. If she's taken out I may be able to salvage something.

(Male)Several years ago a dangerous criminal kidnapped my partner and I've not seen them since. I heard this criminal has now served his time and is back at large. Please don't let what happened to me happen again. Stop him, at all costs.

(Female)Several years ago a dangerous criminal kidnapped my partner and I've not seen them since. I heard this criminal has now served her time and is back at large. Please don't let what happened to me happen again. Stop her, at all costs.

(Male)A small-time weapons dealer is trying to boost his reputation by branching out into open violence. We're not prepared to let him upset the status quo, so we want him removed before he can cause too much trouble.

(Female)A small-time weapons dealer is trying to boost her reputation by branching out into open violence. We're not prepared to let her upset the status quo, so we want her removed before she can cause too much trouble.

(Male)I feel ashamed to admit that I have fallen for a con artist's trap. He tricked me into giving him almost everything I own. I don't have much hope of getting that back, but I want him to pay for what he's done.

(Female)I feel ashamed to admit that I have fallen for a con artist's trap. She tricked me into giving her almost everything I own. I don't have much hope of getting that back, but I want her to pay for what she's done.

(Male)We want you to deal with an agent who has double-crossed us and has started working as a snitch for one of our rivals. Before he gives them any more information, we want to see that he is safely removed.

(Female)We want you to deal with an agent who has double-crossed us and has started working as a snitch for one of our rivals. Before she gives them any more information, we want to see that she is safely removed.

page.title: Upkeep Missions
page.t: Acquire a Captain(see:{20208,30101}) for your ship, $OBJECT$.
Acquire a Manager(see:{20208,30301}) for your station, $OBJECT$.
Transfer funds to your station, $OBJECT$. Funds will be used for the buying of production resources as well as drones and ammo to help secure the station.
Extend your station's radar capability to increase its operational range.
It must be capable of transporting:
Assign a Mining Ship to your station.
Assign a Freighter to your station.
Assign a capital ship to defend your station.
To help trade with others, this station needs transport drones. Acquire these drones.
To help with defence, this station needs combat drones. Acquire these drones.
This ship is lacking the drones to effectively mine. Acquire these drones.
This ship is lacking the drones to effectively trade. Acquire these drones.
(object settings)Through the manager, set the operational range of the station to the whole system if desired.
This ship is currently in need of fuel. If desired, set it to refuel automatically.
After a successful boarding operation, the Marine Commander should be brought back aboard your ship.
Before you sell one of your ships, you should bring your crew back aboard.
It has been requested that certain units are delivered to this station to improve its operation.
It has been requested that certain units are delivered to this ship to improve its operation.
Assign a ship to this station to help expand its capability.
Assign a trade ship to this station to help in the buying of resources and selling of products.
Assign a mining ship to this station to help in the collection of resources.
Assign a combat ship to this station to help in its defence.
To fully utilise your station, $OBJECT$, you can ask it to trade wares as well as store them. You can manage the trade offers this station makes through its manager(translators:see 21208,601).

page.title: Build Station
page.t: Instead of trying to pull together for a brighter future, there are some that still wish to fight, and of course there is the ever present threat of the Xenon, and rumours of the Kha'ak. With all of this in mind, we feel the need for more static defensive capability, and request that a defensive installation be built in the following location to help us deter threats from our space. We will require the facility to fit the following specifications.\nDestination: $DESTINATION$\n$REQUIREMENTS$

With so much conflict around the Jump Gate network, we feel it is only a matter of time before this area of space sees major conflict, and would like to be prepared for this scenario. We request that a defensive platform station be built in the sector specified to help us deter threats from our space. The facility must fit the following specifications.\nDestination: $DESTINATION$\n$REQUIREMENTS$

Recent economic patterns tend to suggest that it is time to inject more production into the market with the creation of a new station. This will not only benefit us, but the entire market. We request that someone build this station as soon as is viable to make sure that the economy is as stable as possible. The factory must fit the following specifications.\nDestination: $DESTINATION$\n$REQUIREMENTS$

We are looking for an opportunity to invest more into certain productions across the entire range of the economy, but are not station builders ourselves. If you are interested in getting into the business and making a tidy sum of money along the way, we invite you to build a factory with the following specifications that may make us all money for many years to come.\nDestination: $DESTINATION$\n$REQUIREMENTS$

After a number of deadly incidents caused by the use of sub-standard metal in ship construction, we desperately need to secure a more trustworthy supply. We are prepared to invest in the construction of such a station, as long as the contractor can ensure the utmost quality. If you believe you are up to the task, please contact us. The station must be built to the following specifications:\nDestination: $DESTINATION$\n$REQUIREMENTS$

As you no doubt know, the local shipyards are vital for not only the security of our space but also the well-being of our economy. Unfortunately, given the rising need for military assets, we can expect shortages in a variety of areas. To ensure even the most basic of resources, we would like to encourage the construction of new factories with the focus on ship construction materials. Should you have experience in station construction, please concider joining us in this venture. These are the station specifications:\nDestination: $DESTINATION$\n$REQUIREMENTS$
Low-Grade Smart Chips Flooding the Market

We have been hired by the local authorities to investigate the increased reports of navigational system errors in a variety of ship and drone tech. These events often resulted in ships smashing into asteroids or attempting to dock in rather unconventional ways. The source appears to be cost-cutting at several Smart Chips production facilities, leading to less than satisfactory performance of the products they are used in. While we work with these corporations to bring them up to standard, we also request new production facilities to fill the gap. These are the station specifications:\nDestination: $DESTINATION$\n$REQUIREMENTS$
We require a new station to be built in order to maintain our investment in a nearby area. We will require the station to fit the following specification.\nDestination: $DESTINATION$\n$REQUIREMENTS$

We're looking to invest to some capacity in a new station in the local vicinity and would like to ask up-and-coming architects to provide this station. It will need to fit the following specification.\nDestination: $DESTINATION$\n$REQUIREMENTS$

page.title: Destroy Matching Objects
page.t: We've identified a station in nearby Xenon space that seems critical to their production line. We're interested in hiring someone willing to fly close to the station and destroy drones that ferry resources around the facility.
Recent Xenon activity has forced us onto the offensive. We'd like to disrupt their production line as much as possible by destroying drones ferrying resources around their station.

A nearby Xenon station has been identified as critical to their production line. If we can disrupt the flow of their supplies by taking out the drones ferrying resources around this station, it will drastically slow the Xenon down; a huge victory for us in of itself.

page.title: Find Resources
page.t: In order to secure the resources we need to keep our economy healthy at this time, we require you to find a high-yield field with resources of the following type: $WARENAMES$
Recent shortages have had us in dire need of finding a new source of natural resources. Use resource probes to find areas with the following minimum yields in $SPACENAME$. $WARENAMES$

page.title: Prison Break
page.t: So, mistakes were made and I somehow landed myself in the brig on this station. Details don't really matter. Fact is: I don't really care to spend the rest of my life in prison. Fancy helping me out? Maybe finding something to jack the lock on my cell door? It isn't a complicated lock - it shouldn't take too much time. Of course, if you help me, I'll help you out too. I'm not a monster. I know to reward people for good work.\n\nAlright. Hope to see you soon.
Find items across the platform to craft a lockpick

page.title: Assassinate
page.t: (ma target ship info before accepting mission)TARGET SHIP TYPE:
(fe target ship info before accepting mission){30134,11}

(ma target)One of my associates was stupid enough to double-cross me on a deal. He obviously thought he could get away with it, but he underestimated how upset he made me. Taking care of him will send a very clear message that I am not one to be double-crossed. If you are willing to help me in this endeavour, I will compensate you greatly for your time and efforts. What do you think?

(fe target)One of my associates was stupid enough to double-cross me on a deal. She obviously thought she could get away with it, but she underestimated how upset she made me. Taking care of her will send a very clear message that I am not one to be double-crossed. If you are willing to help me in this endeavour, I will compensate you greatly for your time and efforts. What do you think?

(ma target)Some lousy Argnu herder has run off having stolen something from me. He did not leave long ago, so he could not have gone far yet. Take him out and you will be greatly rewarded. No one steals from me. No one!

(fe target)Some lousy Argnu herder has run off having stolen something from me. She did not leave long ago, so she could not have gone far yet. Take her out and you will be greatly rewarded. No one steals from me. No one!
(next ID reserved for gender)Silence Is Golden

(ma target)We've spotted him! $NPCNAME$ is a damned snitch and we need someone to make sure he doesn't get to speak to anyone else after this day! If you're the one to get this done, we'll pay you well.

(fe target)We've spotted her! $NPCNAME$ is a damned snitch and we need someone to make sure she doesn't get to speak to anyone else after this day! If you're the one to get this done, we'll pay you well.
(next ID reserved for gender)The Early Bird

(ma target)This lowlife is trying to get revenge on my friend for some incident which happened years ago. When we first found out about it, we just ignored him. But now he is accumulating credits to put a bounty on my friend. Make him stop.

(fe target)This lowlife is trying to get revenge on my friend for some incident which happened years ago. When we first found out about it, we just ignored her. But now she is accumulating credits to put a bounty on my friend. Make her stop.
(next ID reserved for gender - generic mission)Keep the Peace

(ma target)My ancestors told me of the gang wars from the days when this sector was still disconnected from the others. It was our kin who came out victorious and have controlled the distribution of certain wares ever since. We own this sector, we take our share and we keep the peace. But since the Gate network reopened, rogue dealers endanger the peace and disrespect our claim. This sector is plagued by one of them. Make sure he stops doing business here.

(fe target)My ancestors told me of the gang wars from the days when this sector was still disconnected from the others. It was our kin who came out victorious and have controlled the distribution of certain wares ever since. We own this sector, we take our share and we keep the peace. But since the Gate network reopened, rogue dealers endanger the peace and disrespect our claim. $NPCNAME$ is one of them. Make sure she stops doing business here.
(next ID reserved for gender - Argon target mission)Retire the War-Monger

(ma target)There are a couple of extremely xenophobic characters in Argon politics. One of those is pushing for the Argon Federation to take military action wherever an opportunity arises. This irrational behaviour endangers lives and, more importantly, contracts and has no place in politics. We will pay you well to cleanse the Argon democracy of this expendable figure.
(next ID reserved for gender - Argon target mission)Justice by Courier

(ma target)Every once in a while the flawed Argon judicial system releases criminals back into the sector unpunished. It took them a while, but the victim's family gathered enough credits to serve him justice. Make sure he receives it.

(fe target)Every once in a while the flawed Argon judicial system releases criminals back into the sector unpunished. It took them a while, but the victim's family gathered enough credits to serve her justice. Make sure she receives it.
(next ID reserved for gender - Argon target mission)Don't Get Mad, Get Even

(ma target)$NPCNAME$ is a shady business representative for a notoriously bad corporation. In fact, he is probably the sole reason for the company's continued persistence in the market. Their faulty products are causing all kinds of trouble around the sector, yet still they are favoured over others with government contracts, due to the 'persuasion tactics' $NPCNAME$ is applying to government officials. Now, however, he has gone too far and had a local politician's spouse killed. There is not enough evidence to connect him to this incident, but that shouldn't prevent $NPCNAME$ from paying for what he did.

(fe target)$NPCNAME$ is a shady business representative for a notoriously bad corporation. In fact, she is probably the sole reason for the company's continued persistence in the market. Their faulty products are causing all kinds of trouble around the sector, yet still they are favoured over others with government contracts, due to the 'persuasion tactics' $NPCNAME$ is applying to government officials. Now, however, she has gone too far and had a local politician's spouse killed. There is not enough evidence to connect her to this incident, but that shouldn't prevent $NPCNAME$ from paying for what she did.
(next ID reserved for gender - Paranid target mission)Religious Nuisance

(ma target)There is an infamous extremist who is causing all kinds of problems. He targets even devoted Paranid whenever they do not abide by his own personal, and very strict, interpretations of the holy texts. Since he is a descendant of a religious authority, the Paranid around him are not able to put him in his place and are looking for someone outside of their religious circle to solve their problem. They would pay a lot if you were willing to do it for them.

(fe target)There is an infamous extremist who is causing all kinds of problems. She targets even devoted Paranid whenever they do not abide by her own personal, and very strict, interpretations of the holy texts. Since she is a descendant of a religious authority, the Paranid around her are not able to put her in her place and are looking for someone outside of their religious circle to solve their problem. They would pay a lot if you were willing to do it for them.
(next ID reserved for gender - Paranid target mission)Gone Too Far

(ma target)There is a Paranid religious figure who is not abiding by his vows. His negligence has made him too many enemies among his brothers and sisters. They warned him about his attitude, but he would not learn and now they will not tolerate his behaviour any longer. An official penalty would shed a bad light on their institution which is why they want him to just disappear.

(fe target)There is a Paranid religious figure who is not abiding by her vows. Her negligence has made her too many enemies among her brothers and sisters. They warned her about her attitude, but she would not learn and now they will not tolerate her behaviour any longer. An official penalty would shed a bad light on their institution which is why they want her to just disappear.
(next ID reserved for gender - Paranid target mission)Necessary Cleansing

(ma target)I once was a truth-seeker for my kin. Two of us qualified thanks to our scientific research, but only one could rise in rank and become lead scientist in our facility. While I tried prove myself worthy through diligent work, my competitor curried favour with the clerics. In the end, he stole my research to claim the position. I accused him of the crime, but did not have many friends among the clergy. He made a fool of me and now I'm being shunned by my former brothers and sisters. It is not right to act against your own kin, but one of my minds demands punishment for this behaviour, harmful not only to me but to our cause as a whole. I want this deviant brother to be removed from our society.

(fe target)I once was a truth-seeker for my kin. Two of us qualified thanks to our scientific research, but only one could rise in rank and become lead scientist in our facility. While I tried prove myself worthy through diligent work, my competitor curried favour with the clerics. In the end, she stole my research to claim the position. I accused her of the crime, but did not have many friends among the clergy. She made a fool of me and now I'm being shunned by my former brothers and sisters. It is not right to act against your own kin, but one of my minds demands punishment for this behaviour, harmful not only to me but to our cause as a whole. I want this deviant sister to be removed from our society.
(next ID reserved for gender - Teladi target mission)With Friends like That...

(ma target)My best friend is also a very strong competitor. His business pushes smaller corporations out of the market and makes me lose out on too much income. My business is not sustainable the way things are currently going, and I could end up being forced to sell my company. Sadly it is impossible to convince Teladi to act against their financial interest. As much as it pains me, the only way to retain my business is to hire a thug like you to get rid of my friend.

(fe target)My best friend is also a very strong competitor. Her business pushes smaller corporations out of the market and makes me lose out on too much income. My business is not sustainable the way things are currently going, and I could end up being forced to sell my company. Sadly it is impossible to convince Teladi to act against their financial interest. As much as it pains me, the only way to retain my business is to hire a thug like you to get rid of my friend.
(next ID reserved for gender - Teladi target mission)Line of Succession

(ma target, space-teladi have only one parent and reproduce parthenogenetic)My egg siblings and I share a claim on our parent's heritage. Considering all of us are our parent's biological clones, we all think alike. Our parent taught us that although paying thugs to assassinate siblings may result in a greater share of the heritage, and thus profit, siblings who pay for more assassinations actually suffer greater loss. The solution to this dilemma is of course to wait it out until all but one sibling is dead, and just pay for the assassination of the remaining one. Since none of us wanted to pay to up to be the first, most of us were still around until recently. But the time has come; our parent's will to live is fading and my siblings are starting to disappear. Being scared for my own life, I need to take precautions and want you to eliminate my most ambitious sibling from the list of heirs.
(next ID reserved for gender - Teladi target mission)Organ Traders

(ma target)Over the generations our parthenogenetic descendants tend to accumulate genetic defects. I was particularly unlucky in this regard and had to get multiple organs replaced. It appears that my medical provider was not only very cheap, but also shady. I tried to report them, but it went nowhere and they did not take it well. It seems I need to take the law into my own claws. Please deliver a message of discontent on my behalf directly to one of their organ harvesters.

page.title: Bring Items
page.t: (Tool tip)Collect the items before trying to deliver them.

Regardless of what your governments and organisations tell you, people need what I'm selling, but my last runner didn't come through for me. I need someone to get to a supplier and bring me a new batch, without any fuss, and certainly without getting caught. I'm willing to pay more than the shipment's worth as I'm already behind schedule, and there'll be a bonus too. Are you interested?

You may have noticed that recently, the local government and policing forces have been quite active in shutting down operations that they deem to be... unsuitable for the general public. This crackdown has affected my personal income, and I need someone to resupply me with some items that have gone missing in action. I'm willing to pay over the shipment's worth, and maybe a bonus for quick delivery. Are you interested?

Some of the refinery equipment used aboard this station is known to be quite temperamental, especially when used frequently. With this in mind, we're looking for someone to supply us with some small but key parts that we can use as replacements in case of a break-down, so that production is not slowed more than absolutely necessary.

With the Xenon an ever-constant threat to the Jump Gate network and the ongoing Paranid Civil War, demand for weapons has now been high for some time. In order to ensure a safe supply, we are starting to look beyond the standard weapon components brought to us by our trading partners and will pay good Credit for any parts that may help us with our production.

While the standard spices produced on the market suffice to give our food good taste and most people are happy with them, we feel people are missing out on more interesting flavours and we could get ahead of the competition by seeking out rarer and more exotic spices. We will pay anyone who can bring some of these spices to the manager of this station.
Help Us Keep Our Water Clean

It is vital for the entire Jump Gate network that the water we produce is both clean and usable, and so it is equally important that our water filtration systems are always maintained and working. To minimise the risk of contamination, or down-time while we fix a problem, we will pay anyone who can bring replacement parts that are compatible with our systems to the station manager.

While one might not expect weeds to be a problem in an artifical environment, it is indeed so. This station has recently had to deal with a number of unwanted plants making their way into our farms, and so we're looking for someone to provide us with safe herbicides, or the chemicals required for them, that we can use to control the spread before it gets out of hand. Suppliers will be well rewarded.

I have a meeting with a potential business partner soon, and I'm looking to make a good first impression. Having done some research, I know they are a fan of fine dining and I'd like to impress them with an extravagant meal, but I don't know the first thing about cooking! I'll reward anyone who can bring me some high-quality ingredients that might nail down this deal for me.

page.title: Deploy Object
page.t: Even if we're told the future looks bright and peaceful, recent events have taught us that it is still better to keep an eye on who is entering our space. With that in mind, we are looking for someone to help us build a satellite network around the entry locations in this sector.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

The economy is rapidly growing and changing, and more and more businesses are doing whatever they can to find an advantage. To stay ahead of the competition, we'd like to build a satellite network keeping coverage of their stations. Knowing more about the ships that come and go will enable us to make an educated guess on the stations' storage levels - this will be our advantage when negotiating future trade deals.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

Our space and our people must be protected from the heathens that seek to corrupt us. To this end, we wish for you to defend the entrances into our space with explosive mines, so that we may send a message to anyone who may threaten us and our way of life.

In order to make sure we have a clear-cut advantage over our competitors in the coming weeks, we'd like to see their traders... delayed by some well-located but inexplicably placed explosive mines. We're looking for a third-party contractor to place these mines around the Gates, superhighways and accelerators in our competitors' territories.

We've noticed a competitor that has been growing stronger recently making attempts to push us out of the market. As they've pushed us, we have no problem with pushing back, but of course we respect competition. It would be a very unfortunate turn of events were they to suffer some... high-impact safety issues in the vicinity of their station. Very unfortunate indeed.

If the corrupters and the weak cannot be kept out of our space through sheer force alone, then we must also make them fear us. Place laser towers at our Gates, accelerators and superhighways to ensure that any unwanted attention is swiftly forced to return to their home, or dealt with more permanently, and our people may rest well at night.

In this highly-competitive environment any small delay in a trade run can prove critical to the success or failure of an organisation. We'd like to see some delays added to our competitors' run times, and we feel some... reasons to find a slower but safer route may be in order. Laser towers near their territory's entry points should do the trick.

After a drastic drop in our earnings recently, we've identified one station as being key to our current problems. Of course if this station were to see a sudden drop in traffic, we might be able to tip the scales back in our favour. Some strategically placed laser towers around this station should be a good way to caution traders to stay away.

We seek a contractor to deploy a number of laser towers around a potentially vulnerable station. While laser towers are commonly used as a deterrent, they have in the past turned the tide of battles when used effectively. In these uncertain times, we deem it fit to increase our military presence wherever possible.

page.title: Destroy Objects
page.t: (hint)These asteroids are highly volatile. Keep your distance and use long-range weapons to take them out.

We were very surprised to learn that explosive mines have been placed in the vicinity of one of our supplier stations. We urgently require this station's produce for the smooth operation of our own stations, and we suspect that our main competitor is responsible for this disgusting economic terrorism. You will be paid to assist in the safe removal of these mines.

Once again, our main competitor has proved what low depths they'll reach to in order to gain an advantage, placing explosive mines around one of our supplier station in order to push us out of the market. We're looking for someone who can safely and swiftly dismantal the mines on our behalf.

We are preparing to move our fleet into enemy territory, but they have laid down mines that need clearing before we arrive. As any of our forces in the area would draw attention to us, we're looking to contract outside help.

Our enemy has stopped us from moving our fleet into their territory by placing a minefield blocking our approach. At this time we cannot risk one of our own ships being caught in enemy space, so we'd like to hire you to clear out the minefield instead.

Some pirates have laid down tracker mines in a nearby zone. Many organisations have already started losing ships and if someone doesn't deal with the problem soon, it will only get worse. We'll pay for you to disarm these mines.
We're not sure who or why but mines have been laid in a nearby zone. We need skilled pilots, preferably ones with experience, to fly to the area and take care of the mines.

When we noticed a sudden drop in traffic around one of our stations, we did not suspect that someone had placed laser towers around it in order to deter our traders from stopping by. We suspect that one of our competitors is responsible for this dirty trick, and are looking for someone to help us in removing the towers so that trading might return to normal.

Earlier today a mining drone was destroyed as the asteroid it was approaching exploded. It seems that some of the asteroids in the sector $SECTOR$ are rigged to blow. We need pilots capable of identifying the rigged asteroids and detonating them from a distance.
(hint)Check the contents of asteroids in the area.

Ships travelling by an asteroid field in the sector $SECTOR$ keep being destroyed. We suspect some of the asteroids have been rigged with explosives, and need someone to destroy them or detonate them from a distance before there is more disruption.
(Antigone and Teladi Trade Guild)Manual Update Required

We recently discovered a flaw in our mines' software which makes them especially vulnerable to hacking attempts. Since time is of the essence, and our usual maintenance technician is currently trapped in a minefield he was supposed to update, we have to ask you to take care of the situation for us. Please destroy the marked cluster of mines in this sector.

A recent pirate raid on our local trade routes has left this sector littered with mines. The danger posed by these explosives is turning away potential investors and severely decreases our projected profit margins. In the name of our Trade Guild, we ask you to protect our interests and remove the marked cluster of mines.

page.title: Rescue Ship
page.t: One of our trading pilots thought they could make it through a mine field that has been placed on one of our trade routes. It took them all of a minute to realise that they were stuck, and now we're running behind schedule. If you can help us by clearing the minefield around the ship, there's still enough time to salvage the contract before one of our competitors swoops in to steal it from us.

During a high-speed escape from their former 'friends', a crew of Scale Plate defectors managed to maroon themselves in a cluster of their own mines nearby. We have offered them safe conduct in return for inside information on pirate operations, but this deal means nothing as long as they are unable to leave the danger zone. If you are confident in your ability to handle tracker mines, please find a way to remove them without damaging the ship.

We are continuously updating our security protocols and defensive installations to stay ahead in the galactic arms race. Due to their volatile and fickle nature, tracker mines have often caused us problems in this regard. Last time, we hired an especially eager contractor, who insisted on a 'hands on' approach. Halfway through the process, they realised their mistake and, in trying to revert the software update, accidentally reset the mines' friend-or-foe recognition. We are legally obligated to remove the malfunctioning mines and would like to outsource this task to pilots of all skill levels. If you are up for it, please also make sure not to damage our former contractor's ship, as his demise would unnecessarily strain our insurance.

One of our military scientists was running tests on new, experimental smart mine software - they had to deploy the mines in order to complete the tests thoroughly. Unbeknownst to them, there was a bug in the software that means every time the scientist attempts to move their vessel, the mines activate and track them. They've had to shut down all engines and thrusters to remain safe. Please detonate the mines so that the scientist, key to our future research, might be rescued.

Our reconnaissance found an inactive minefield which has been identified as Xenon technology. A military scientist, eager to research Xenon engineering, has been deployed to examine the mines and extract relevant hardware. Unfortunately in his endeavours he triggered some safeguard within the mines and activated the whole field. It's a miracle that they didn't blow him up right away, but now he is stuck and, from his position, is unable to safely attempt an escape. To return the scientist, his research and the hardware he was able to extract, we need someone to disarm the mines without harming the ship and its crew.

One of our minefields has been taken over by an unknown party. The hacked mines behave as usual, until they identify a ship they are supposed to let through. The malware then primes the mines trapping the ship inside. Another ship with transit clearance got trapped inside one of our minefields. We need someone to free the victim and their ship unharmed.

To update old software on a couple of our mines we commissioned a contractor. Trying to accomplish this, the contractor obviously broke some of the security protocols they were supposed to follow and trapped themselves inside the minefield. With the mines now being of no use to anyone, we need someone to free our contractor so that they can face the legal consequences of their protocol breach and compensate us for the material loss.

During a heated debate the pilot's spouse trapped them and their ship by releasing and priming the mines they were carrying. It remains unclear why they were carrying mines to begin with. Given their affiliation to the Argon Federation, we see an obligation to deliver them from this situation. Unrelated to this incident we are also interested in an examination of their legal documents. To do so, we need someone to disarm the explosives without harming the ship and its crew.

As part of my business ventures, I maintain a couple of minefields. They present no threat to any reasonable pilot, as they do not explode on approach, but only when ships try to depart. The locals have long-since learned to avoid them anyway. Trapped ships are charged a release fee and offered a great discount on better scanners. As it would be unreasonably expensive for me to free the trapped customers myself, I need someone to free them for a share of the fee. Sadly it is also too expensive to retrieve and reuse the mines, which is why contractors usually destroy them.

In accordance with the will of the Pontifex, Paranid stationary defences are examined regularly by an official representative of our most benevolent Priest King. While applying the necessary seals and certificates to a cluster of tracking mines, the commissioner failed to follow protocol and reactivated their motion sensors prematurely. Though he was immediately charged with negligence and obligated to seek holy absolution, the matter of his retrieval remains unresolved. Should you be inclined to devote yourself to this low-priority mission, you may still receive a suitable reward. As always, we expect nothing less than flawless execution.

page.title: Rescue Ship - Abandoned
page.t: A local pirate has abandoned their ship not too far away, and we believe it to be carrying important data that we'd like recovered. Before we could get to the ship though, with the pilot still missing, the pirates placed smart mines around it, which makes it difficult to get close. We need someone to disarm the mines without destroying the ship.

We're looking for a good and careful pilot, ideally with experience in disarming smart mines, to deal with a situation nearby. A ship we've been tracking for some time has been abandoned, and the pilot ordered smart mines placed around it so that we couldn't get close. We need this ship in as good a condition as possible, so please be careful when disarming the explosives.

page.title: Scan
page.t: A person of interest to us has been spotted recently and we would very much like to know a bit more about their ship. Unfortunately, they know we're coming, so we're looking for someone who can deep-scan the ship on our behalf and send the information back to us. We'll take it from there. $PERCENT$

A ship we've been tracking for quite some time has now entered our space and we'd like to take the opportunity to gather as much information about it as we can. However we feel that if they see one of our ships coming, they might become spooked and try to flee, so we're looking for someone to deep-scan the ship for us. $PERCENT$

It's only natural to keep an eye on the competition, and we've noticed recently that one of our competitor's ships has changed its route. We'd like to gather some more data on the ship to see what our competitor is up to, but think that we'll scare them off if we do this ourselves. We're seeking someone to deep-scan the ship and send the information back to us for a finder's fee. $PERCENT$

An operation is set to occur surely to acquire a ship while it is nearby, but before we make a move, we'd like to make sure we're not running into any nasty surprises. Working towards this, we'd like to hire someone to complete a deep scan of the ship and send the information back to us. $PERCENT$

We've noticed some of our customers slip away from us recently, in favour of one of our competitors. Some research has shown that one of their station has seen some recent changes, and we would like to get a better idea of what these changes might be in order to refind our advantage. Please provide us with a deep scan of the station. $PERCENT$

It's true that some information is free, but that doesn't mean it's always simple to acquire. We're looking to update our database so that we can keep a good overview on things, and require an analysis of a station in order to achieve this. Please complete a deep scan of the station and send us the results for payment. $PERCENT$

We are in the business of keeping tabs on our rivals and our enemies, and so we remain vigilant with regard to their activities and technologies. We'd like to make a threat assessment of a nearby station - one of our agents must complete a deep scan of the station for us to achieve this. $PERCENT$

We regularly and thoroughly inspect our stations to make sure that any problems can be dealt with quickly and efficiently. One of our stations is due such an inspection, but all of our inspectors are currently busy. We would like someone to complete the scan of the station on our behalf and return the data to us, and for this they will be paid. $PERCENT$

In order to make sure they are available for public use, as well as for research and development purposes, we do regular check ups to see whether companies and organisations have made any changes to the blueprints used to build station modules. This time has come again, and we are looking for someone to complete a deep scan of a module so that we can update our records. $MODULE$

Recent scans of one of our competitor's stations has revealed an interesting tweak to one of the station modules that means they've been able to make their production line more efficient. Copying the competition might not get you ahead, but it certainly gives you a good starting point, and we'd like a deep scan of the station module in order to dig up the new blueprints to look at ourselves. $MODULE$

Our organisation is thinking of branching out into new productions, but we currently lack the information to know whether this is economically viable for us. Recent complications means we are tied up with the authorities and cannot currently access the blueprints that would be necessary for these productions, so we're looking for someone to acquire them for us. $MODULE$

We have reason to believe that the management team of a nearby station has been making suspect changes to the design of one of their modules that would break convention and set a dangerous precedent for future station building. We would like a trust-worthy pilot to conduct a deep scan of this module so that we can analyse the blueprint and confirm this. $MODULE$

It should be well known throughout this space that there are certain wares that are illegal. Even so, we repeatedly catch ships ferrying these wares through our space, and would like to increase our scans in order to crack down on the issue. Please scan ships in the local area and report any that are carrying the following: $WARE$

Did you ever wonder how much precious energy your ship wastes while you're running simple errands? Are you losing sleep over the staggering logistical paradox of Energy Cell transports? Worry no more! We are currently assembling a report which will shine a light on this issue and revolutionise trading efficiency. You could help us by scanning ships for Energy Cells and transferring the collected data to us for some small compensation.

Ore has always been easy to find, cheap to mine and quick to sell. A recent increase in activity by independent miners, no doubt encouraged by the reopened gate connections, has made it difficult to monitor this elusive flow of raw materials. We would therefore like to expand our network and offer a reward for any information about ships carrying Ore. We only accept scans from this sector: $TARGETSPACE$

According to our contract with various large logistics enterprises, our corporation holds a monopoly on large scale Silicon transportation in this sector. Corporate intelligence, however, suggests that one of our partners is not honouring our agreement and is employing various freelancers to ship Silicon through our sector. To confirm our suspicions, any scans of ships transporting Silicon that you can provide will be suitably rewarded. Scan ships travelling through this sector: $TARGETSPACE$

Dear pilot \nAs you may be aware, our beloved sector is notorious for its water shortages, but the sector administration fails to admit this and refuses to allocate more water supplies. To back up our claim with hard evidence, we're compiling statistics on local water transportation. YOU can help our cause by simply providing scans of water transport ships. Any useful data will be rewarded. By useful, we mean that the ship you scan is travelling through our sector: $TARGETSPACE$

We have noticed a stark increase in people caught carrying illicit items in their personal inventories, and we feel that an increase in scans in the local area might discourage such behaviour before it becomes a serious problem. Please scan ships and report any pilots caught carrying the following: $ITEM$

A dangerous criminal is known to be active in our space, and though we've been trying to track their movements, they have recently been able to give us the slip. We know the area in which they were last seen, and don't believe them to have moved far, but we need to know which ship they are currently on in order to stop them: $PERSONNAME$

We have been given reason to believe that a ship that is active in our space belongs to a vicious crime syndicate that we are working hard to stop. The ship was last seen in the local area, but we currently have nothing and no one tracking its exact location. If anyone sees the ship with the following ID in the area, they are advised to contact us immediately: $IDCODE$

page.title: Large Supply
page.t: These are the foodstuffs in need:\n$SUPPLIES$
Please bring as many of the following wares as you can to any of our stations.\n$SUPPLIES$
You are competing with other merchants who can also deliver these wares.
Objectives are updated in real time.
Objectives and rewards are updated in real time.
Rewards are updated in real time.
We must guarantee that our food supplies in this sector are sufficient enough in the case that we are blockaded. Help stock the stations with food for their workforce.
As part of our combat preparations we are looking to increase the number of certain supplies to our shipyards and equipment docks dramatically.
We must guarantee that we have a suitable stockpile of food in this sector, primarily due to the threat the Xenon pose to our supply lines. Help stock the stations with food for their workforce.
We are preparing to drive up ship production as part of our combat preparations against the Xenon. To do so, we need to secure certain supplies for our shipyards and equipment docks.

page.title: Get Crew
page.t: We are looking for experienced people.
We are looking for experts in their field.

In order to expand our operations and meet our next group of targets, we are looking to hire a number of pilots to work for us. Each should be trained as described below and brought or make their way to the following location.
Seeking: $NPCCOUNT$x Pilot\(s\)
$DESTINATION$
$SKILLS$

With ongoing conflicts threatening to spill over into peaceful space, we're looking to hire more engineers to ensure that our stations remain maintained and can be quickly repaired. Each should be trained as described below and brought or make their way to the following location.
Seeking: $NPCCOUNT$x Engineer\(s\)
$DESTINATION$
$SKILLS$

With a host of new stations built over the last few weeks we are looking for a number of qualified managers to look after them for us. Each should be trained as described below and brought or make their way to the following location.
Seeking: $NPCCOUNT$x Manager\(s\)
$DESTINATION$
$SKILLS$

This is a general call for anyone looking for excitement and adventure, and the opportunity to serve as part of a great military body. We are looking for fit and healthy marines that are willing to help us in any of our boarding operations. Each should be trained as described below and brought or make their way to the following location.
Seeking: $NPCCOUNT$x Marine\(s\)
$DESTINATION$
$SKILLS$

page.title: Build Fleet
page.t: We want you to build a fleet with specific ships.

I need a ship for my own purposes relatively soon, and while I don't need a specific ship, I do require it to be capable of certain things. Unfortunately I am currently unable to access the facilities of any shipyards, so I need someone else to... acquire the ship for me and deliver it to the destination below. Please make sure the ship has the following specification: $FLEET$\n\nDelivery location: $SECTOR$

We're looking for a ship with a certain specification \(detailed below\) for our next operation, but it's very important that there's no proof of sale and it can't be tracked back to us. With that in mind, we're looking for someone to help us... otherwise acquire any ship matching these requirements. I trust you'll come through for us.

Specification: $FLEET$

Handover at: $SECTOR$

page.title: Sabotage
page.t: We are organising an operation in which a competitor's station may find itself under significant fire, in order to make sure that they don't hold too much of an advantage over us in the market. Before that operation though, we need someone to go to the station and quietly remove some of the station defences.

A former associate of mine has parted ways and decided to build a station directly competing with my own. As revenge for their little betrayal, I'd like to see them distracted by a small scare on their station; all of the defences being destroyed at once. This should be done quietly, to ensure maximum effectiveness.

My associates and I are looking to make something disappear from this station, but can't make a move unless station management and local law enforcement is somewhat distracted. It shouldn't be fancy; just enough to make them look away from the right monitor for a few moments. Sabotaging station defences would do the trick nicely.

Some colleagues and I are targeting a ship as the victim of our next raid. Usually we would take care of disabling the ship ourselves, but our specialist was wiped out in a planet-side speeder race. Before we start, we need someone to take out some of the external ship components, quietly, to make sure the ship is ripe for the taking.

page.title: Hack Panel
page.t: We're planning a raid on a nearby station, but we're only flying small ships, so we're worried about the station's fire power. If you want to help us out, and you've got the right equipment for it, you can land on the station and quietly disable the station turrets for us. That'll mean we can carry out the raid without any risk of being torn apart.\n$REQUIREMENT$

We've been hired to take out parts of a station, but our employer was quite clear that the station should be down for a while. If you want in on the reward, you can do us a favour and quietly throw the repair algorithms into disarray so the station can't be repaired. It'll take some work, and some very specific equipment, but it pays well.\n$REQUIREMENT$

We're preparing an operation against a station in the area and need some external help, as we're having trouble getting the right equipment together. It's risky work so we'll pay well, and riskier for us than for you - all you need to do is get the right equipment together and disable the station shields from the right terminal. We'll then be in a position to make our move.\n$REQUIREMENT$

I'd like to give a competitor of mine a little scare. If their stock were to suddenly disappear, they're not necessarily in a position to stay afloat, and there's only one way to ensure that. If you can get the right equipment together, I'm more than happy to pay you to land on the station and find away to disable their storage restrains, so the cargo will be dropped into space. I don't even care what happens to the wares.\n$REQUIREMENT$

I need to get some wares seen as illegal here off this station, but station security has been swarming traffic really aggressively recently. Thing is, their scans don't mean anything without a central system behind it, and that can be taken out with the right hacking equipment. If you come onto the station and disable that system for a while, then I can make my move with far less risk.\n$REQUIREMENT$

page.title: Repair
page.t: Over time, our satellites have taken on some wear and tear and we are looking for a contractor to spend some time in repairing them. Their hull should be repaired to at least $PERCENTAGE$%.
We are looking for a trusted individual to help us repair a number of data leaks which have accumulated on our station. Repair them with your spacesuit.

page.title: Supply Factory
page.t: We need these goods urgently, so there is a time-limit in place.
This one is going to be a challenge, as we've been forced to set a tight deadline.(difficulty.impossible)

An analysis of our own micro-economy has shown that one of our stations is dangerously low on resources, and if the situation isn't corrected we will run into serious problems. We need this station to have its resource levels raised above: $STORAGEPERCENT$%\n\n$REQUIREMENTS$

One of my stations was recently hit by a pirate raid that saw some of the station storage emptied of my wares. To meet my next targets, I'm looking for it to be refilled as soon as possible. Target to have the station's resource levels raised above: $STORAGEPERCENT$%\n\n$REQUIREMENTS$

While we're not in economic trouble, we've identified that if we can hit some ambitious targets in the next economic period, we'll put ourselves in a far stronger position than we're currently in. In order to achieve these targets, our station needs to have its resources levels raised above: $STORAGEPERCENT$%\n\n$REQUIREMENTS$

A number of our competitors have recently started pushing for more resources and we find ourselves falling behind. To catch up, we're hiring third-party contractors to help provide us with our own resources as well as depending on our regular traders. Please help push our station's resource levels above: $STORAGEPERCENT$%\n\n$REQUIREMENTS$

I'm putting in a resource order to replace some of the ones that have suspiciously disappeared from my station in recent weeks. I need a third party to help with the supply while I solve the underlying problem. I'll pay to see my station's resource levels raised above: $STORAGEPERCENT$%\n\n$REQUIREMENTS$

Recent reports from one of our stations have been disappointing, and after some analysis we have found the manager keeping a low number of resources on location. To remedy this we are now ordering more resource, and we'd like to see the station's resource levels raised above: $STORAGEPERCENT$%\n\n$REQUIREMENTS$

page.title: Retrieve Item
page.t: (Tool tip)The item must be in your possession.
On the Day of My Daughter's Wedding

I'm very displeased. The lowlife who was set to marry my daughter got cold feet and ran off with the ring. She's obviously devastated, and as a loving father I feel the need to make amends. She's not likely to want the ring back, but I need to send a message, or two, to her former betrothed. You will be doing me a great honour by tracking them down and retrieving the ring, then bringing it back to me.

One of the most famous, priceless pieces of art in our history has been stolen from a planet-side museum. We know who is responsible, and the ship that they were last seen in, and need someone to go after the thief and retrieve the art from them. Payment will be given when the art is safely back in the hands of the museum curator.

An heirloom that is set in my will to go to my first-born child has been stolen from me. The thief has made themself known and is asking for a large sum of money to return the item, and threatens to destroy it if I don't pay. Please; this heirloom means the world to my family, and I would dearly like it back. Track down the bandit and return the item to me.

A collection of sensitive data has been stolen while in transit to one of our more secure locations. It's imperative that the person responsible for this theft is tracked down and the data retrieved before it can be spread to the general public. We must put some safety measures in place for the worst case scenario, and in the meantime will pay well for someone retrieving this packet on our behalf.

Some sensitive military data is being transported to a secure facility. It could change a lot for us if we can get to that data before it reaches its final destination. To keep the operation as quiet as possible, we're looking for a third party to find the ship that is transporting the data and force the pilot to drop the packet, then bring it back to us.

We have reason to believe that a very old and very valuable piece of art is being transported from one museum to another. If we can acquire this art while it's in transit, not only can we get more money for it on the black market, but our forgers can also copy the piece and sell the replicas as well. We will cut you in on the deal if you track down the ship transporting the art and retrieve it on our behalf.

page.title: Find Object
page.t: I was attacked by some Scale Plate Pact pirate on my last trading run. I was able to escape, just, but my ship was destroyed and most of my inventory along with it. While I look for a new ship, I'd like someone to go out and see whether anything survived the attack, and bring it back to me if it has.

A transport ship carrying some desperately-needed first aid supplies was attacked while on the way to this station. The ship was destroyed, but we hope at least some of its inventory remains intact. Please retrieve what you can and bring it back to us. We're very grateful for your help.

I hired a pilot to deliver some medical supplies to me, but it was destroyed en route. The pilot was able to tell me that they managed to eject some of the inventory before the explosion, so some of it is still salvageable. I'll pay for the return as many of the supplies as possible.

One of my ships was attacked, by what or who I don't know, when it was last out in space. I haven't heard from the pilot; I just have the last location of the ship from the distress call. I'm assuming the ship has been destroyed, but maybe something can be salvaged? Bring me anything you can find and I'll pay you for it.

One of my runners was caught on their way to this station and had to eject the inventory before the police confiscated it. It's already paid for, so I would like it collected. I'm busy with some other matters, but I'll pay you for whatever you manage to bring back.

A colleague of mine has just informed me that one of our rivals has been intercepted while on a job. I can't get off the station right now and my colleague is too far away, but we want to grab any inventory that remains from that attack before the authorities investigate what happened. You pick up what's left and don't ask any questions. We'll pay you for it.

One of my colleagues has left a haul of items out in the middle of space; they thought it was too dangerous to bring it close to station security. I'm currently unable to fly without drawing attention to myself, so I'll pay well instead to have someone else go out there, find the collection and pick it up without asking too many questions.

One of our many business rivals operates a number of secure stashes in this sector. We want you to carefully open a few of these lockboxes and make their contents disappear. In addition to a credit reward for your troubles, you can keep anything useful that you find.

page.title: Kill Mass Traffic
page.t: There has been a stark increase in criminal traffic on and around this station and we have now been authorised to use lethal force to try to ward them off. Helping us in this endeavour will greatly increase the safety and security of this area, and will also be greatly rewarded.

We're looking to show syndicates like the Scale Plate Pact that they cannot simply get away with major criminal activity within our space, and as they have been advocating acts of violence against us in recent weeks, we have now been authorised to react in kind. Search for criminal traffic around this station and take it out.

We believe a criminal syndicate is planning a major offensive against this station soon, and are preparing for it by sending agents onto the station to take out our defences prior to the attack. If we can cut them off now, we gain a significant advantage, if the pirates decide to attack at all.

My group is planning an operation on this station, but security's been so tight recently that we need one big distraction to pull it off. We need security to be looking in a completely opposite direction. They'd only be doing this if there was a louder, bigger crime going on, so... you know... start shooting. If you get away, you'll be paid well for it.

I'm looking for someone who doesn't mind getting their hands dirty to cause some chaos while I move some heavy-duty equipment off this station. Station security really need to be looking in a different direction, so when I say chaos I mean a lot of it. The kind you'd hate to witness yourself. It's risky, but if you get through it, there's a good sum waiting for you.

page.title: Repair Signal Leak
page.t: We have identified a number of critical leaks across some of our property in recent times and are hiring third parties to help sealing them. On accepting the contract, you will be assigned a number of leaks across a number of our properties and will be expected to repair them at your discretion.\nNumber of properties: $OBJECTCOUNT$

My organisation is looking to make sure our properties are in prime condition for the next set of inspections and are hiring third-party contractors to help us seal leaks across the properties. We're assigning a number of contractors different properties and different leaks. This contract assigns: $OBJECTCOUNT$x properties.

A number of attacks against our property means that there are now leaks that require fixing. We wish to hire a number of people to help us with this, to make sure the work is done quickly. Each person who signs up will be assigned a number of leaks across a number of properties. We hope this is a manageable load for all.\nNumber of properties: $OBJECTCOUNT$

We don't know whether it was one of our competitors or pirates, but someone has detonated a number of EMPs across our properties and we are hiring people to help us fix the leaks they've caused. We're spreading out the work so that no one person must fix all leaks. If you accept the job, we'll assign you to: $OBJECTCOUNT$x properties.

A number of our properties have recently failed their inspections due to leaks that now have to be fixed before it starts to affect our reputation. We are hiring a number of people to help us fix as many of the problems as possible. If you are willing, you can help us in this endeavour by fixing the specified leaks on: $OBJECTCOUNT$x properties.

page.title: Board Ship
page.t: Lend aid to the boarding operation.
The ship should be handed over to me at the following location: $DESTINATION$

One of our informants has reported that there is a ship passing through the area, which we do not want in the hands of the owner. The time window is short, and we are currently lacking manpower, so we are willing to hire outside help to make sure this ship is intercepted and boarded.

A member of the local syndicate, which may have ties to the Scale Plate Pact, has been causing trouble in the area using their very capable ship. They know we're watching them, so we can't make a move, but we're willing to pay to make sure the ship leaves this pirate's possession.

We're looking to delay one of our competitors beyond delaying their traders or pushing away their customers. We think that if one of their ships were to suddenly leave their service, then they would be pushed back months and we'd be able to gain a significant advantage over them.

(ma target)Dear recipient,
My only child and heir to my family's estate has decided to put aside etiquette, and is currently wasting his allowance on oversized ships and other such lavish playthings. Ever since I received word of this troubling behaviour, I have been looking for a suitable way to give my insolent progeny a stern warning. If you consider yourself sufficiently skilled in educational measures, please consider delivering this rebuke on my behalf. In my personal experience, taking away his toys would most likely yield the desired results. As the commoners say, you do not realize what you have until it is gone.

WARNING: Unfortunately, the sector administration might regard this as a criminal act, but you will be compensated for the inconvenience this may cause.

(fe target)Dear recipient,
My only child and heir to my family's estate has decided to put aside etiquette, and is currently wasting her allowance on oversized ships and other such lavish playthings. Ever since I received word of this troubling behaviour, I have been looking for a suitable way to give my insolent progeny a stern warning. If you consider yourself sufficiently skilled in educational measures, please consider delivering this rebuke on my behalf. In my personal experience, taking away her toys would most likely yield the desired results. As the commoners say, you do not realize what you have until it is gone.

WARNING: Unfortunately, the sector administration might regard this as a criminal act, but you will be compensated for the inconvenience this may cause.

(ma target)Everyone knows that the universe is dark and full of dangerous encounters. Nevertheless, one of our potential clients refuses to buy our newest, top-of-the-line security system for his cargo fleet. Please demonstrate to him the benefits of such a purchase by boarding one of his ships, ideally in some remote corner to maximise the effect. You do not need to worry about the merchant's wellbeing, since he is well off and can easily replace the lost cargo and crew.\n\nWARNING: The local authorities have not yet approved this form of advertising, so try to be discreet.

(fe target)Everyone knows that the universe is dark and full of dangerous encounters. Nevertheless, one of our potential clients refuses to buy our newest, top-of-the-line security system for her cargo fleet. Please demonstrate to her the benefits of such a purchase by boarding one of her ships, ideally in some remote corner to maximise the effect. You do not need to worry about the merchant's wellbeing, since she is well off and can easily replace the lost cargo and crew.\n\nWARNING: The local authorities have not yet approved this form of advertising, so try to be discreet.

(ma target)$NPCNAME$ is an incompetent, but relentless undercover agent who has been repeatedly causing trouble for enterprising people such as ourselves. At the moment, his strategy seems to entail flying around aimlessly in an oversized transport ship. If this continues, the agent might eventually uncover our operations by sheer luck. We need a permanent solution to this problem, but since we would prefer to keep our insider knowledge hidden, the options are limited. Instead of killing the agent directly, we want you to board his ship and keep it operational for a while. This way, his employers might not notice the true nature of your mission.\n\nWARNING: It goes without saying that your reputation will suffer for this, but you will be compensated accordingly.

(fe target)$NPCNAME$ is an incompetent, but relentless undercover agent who has been repeatedly causing trouble for enterprising people such as ourselves. At the moment, her strategy seems to entail flying around aimlessly in an oversized transport ship. If this continues, the agent might eventually uncover our operations by sheer luck. We need a permanent solution to this problem, but since we would prefer to keep our insider knowledge hidden, the options are limited. Instead of killing the agent directly, we want you to board her ship and keep it operational for a while. This way, her employers might not notice the true nature of your mission.\n\nWARNING: It goes without saying that your reputation will suffer for this, but you will be compensated accordingly.

(ma target)It is no secret that the most successful freebooting types tend to amass wealth well beyond their ability to spend it. Occasionally however, self-declared 'treasure hunters' wildly misinterpret these stories and set their heart on finding such stashes, which are of course entirely fictional. It has now come to our attention that $NPCNAME$ might be in possession of a clue towards one of these purely imaginary locations. He recently purchased a capital mining ship in preparation for his search, and we would in turn pay a considerable amount to anyone willing to board the ship and permanently relieve him of this burden.\n\nWARNING: Depending on your location, the local authorities might frown upon this act of kindness.

(fe target)It is no secret that the most successful freebooting types tend to amass wealth well beyond their ability to spend it. Occasionally however, self-declared 'treasure hunters' wildly misinterpret these stories and set their heart on finding such stashes, which are of course entirely fictional. It has now come to our attention that $NPCNAME$ might be in possession of a clue towards one of these purely imaginary locations. She recently purchased a capital mining ship in preparation for her search, and we would in turn pay a considerable amount to anyone willing to board the ship and permanently relieve her of this burden.\n\nWARNING: Depending on your location, the local authorities might frown upon this act of kindness.

Do you think you've got what it takes to fly, fight and celebrate alongside the greatest heroes of the galaxy? Luckily for you, this might just be the right opportunity to impress the big guys. We all had humble beginnings, so what would you say to boarding a capital ship? Just kidding; a regular trader will do for starters. A huge one like this:
$SHIP$

WARNING: The local authorities might confuse your display of heroism with the actions of a criminal.

A media conglomerate, whose representative would like to remain anonymous, recently employed us to create high-quality stock footage of boarding operations. If you are interested in earning a share of the proceeds, we would like to assign you one of the required ship specifications, details of which you will find below. Curiously, our contractor did not specify the preferred method of obtaining this video material, so we recommend a straight-forward approach to guarantee a convincing level of realism.
$SHIP$

WARNING: The local authorities might be unfamiliar with modern media operations. Please choose your film set accordingly.

page.title: Track Ship
page.t: A known smuggler has been being tracked over the last few weeks but their exact location has now been lost. We know their last known location, and the tracker placed aboard their ship will respond to the frequency provided on acceptance of this mission. If you can relocate the ship and report their location to us, we can take it from there.

We have been tracking a Xenon ship that seemed to be sticking to the outskirts of our systems, keeping out of the way. We think that it was a scout, and has now disappeared to take its information back to Xenon space. Whatever it found, it must not be allowed to relay the information. Seek out the Xenon's location and report it back to us. We can deal with it from there.

We've received worrying reports that a Kha'ak ship has recently been seen nearby. It's a high priority to track this ship down so that we can analyse the threat it poses. Kha'ak ships leave behind a small trace of kyon particles - if you wish to take on the contract to find this ship, we will provide the markers necessary to find them. The contract will be completed on reporting the ship's exact location.

A ship that has been causing us some problems recently has suddenly disappeared and we're worried about what the pilot might be up to. We did manage to place a short-range tracker on the ship before it vanished, but we now need someone to pick up the tracker's frequency and relocate the ship. We will provide you the necessary frequencies, and all you need do is report the ship's exact location once found.

page.title: Kill On Sight Rarely
page.t: An enemy ship has been spotted recently that we worry is significant to their military efforts. Though our intelligence has been unable to unearth the exact ID code for this ship, so we cannot point you to it, we know it's specification, and if you do find it while travelling and remove it on our behalf, we will be more than willing to reward you suitably.\nShip specification:\n$SPECS$

A number of enemy ships have been spotted recently that give us cause for concern. The reports have all been from civilians, and so don't give us enough information to track down the ships, but we believe we have accurate descriptions of what the ships look like. We are looking for someone willing to remove these ships should you come accross them on your travels.\nShip Specifications:\n$SPECS$

We're looking to send a very clear message to local traders, to remind them that we're here and should be taken seriously. We've noticed a weakness in a specific part of the economy and would like to see a ship supporting this part disappear rather spectacularly. If you can find a ship with the following specification and cause this disappearance, we'll make sure you're paid well for it.\nShip Specification:\n$SPECS$

We're looking to send a very clear message to local traders, to remind them that we're here and should be taken seriously. There's a point of weakness in a specific part of the economy right now, and if ships supporting this part were to go up in smoke, then people would know that we're a threat. Find ships with the following specifications and make sure they are destroyed - we'll pay you well for it.\nShip Specifications:\n$SPECS$

A dangerous criminal is loose. As of yet, no one has been able to give us the ID code belonging to their ship, but we have enough reports now to give a good description of the ship specifications. This criminal has a high bounty on their head, and should you find this ship and destroy it after accepting this contract, you will be well rewarded.\nShip specification:\n$SPECS$

A number of dangerous criminals are loose, and though no one has yet been able to report their ships' ID codes to us, reports do indicate that all of these criminals are flying ships with the same specifications. We believe them to be some kind of growing gang, and will pay for their elimination should you come across any member on your travels.\nShip specifications:\n$SPECS$

A former associate of mine, one who had the misfortune of double-crossing me and the fortune of getting away with it, has been seen returning to the area. Though the whelp that told me about this was unable to tell me the ID code of the lowlife's vessel, they were able to describe it. While the opportunity lasts, I will pay handsomely for this ship's destruction.\nShip specification:\n$SPECS$

A group of thugs that used to work for me, before betraying me for another syndicate, have been seen returning to the area. I've collected this information through a variety of sources, so I can't go after the specific ships, but I have an idea of the ships' specifications, and am happy to contract someone to deal with these ships if they happen to come across them on their travels.\nShip Specifications:\n$SPECS$

Stations are the cornerstone of the economy and society, producing wares and hosting trading merchants and services. Learn how gathering information on stations can lead to profitable trade runs, discounts and mission opportunities.

page.title: Mentor Master Mission
page.descr: Mission descriptions and objectives for the Mentor mission chain
page.t: Satellites and Resource Probes are available at stations where you can upgrade ships.
Your task will require a Satellite and a Resource Probe.
(joke hint)You can gain a speed boost by boosting.
