I fear time grows short for my research. Any longer and I expect other inquisitive minds may also stumble upon the mysterious signals I am investigating. As my assistant, you will experience first hand, a great number of interesting and peculiar scientific oddities. I long for the day that I am free to pursue these myself but alas, my current situation only allows me to watch from afar.

To further progress in our research, we must learn more about this location. Any attempt to excite the anomaly is potentially dangerous and we must reduce that risk to an acceptable level. I have a number of suggestions that should help us understand the anomaly and its effect on nearby space.

I believe we are ready to move to a more active stage in our research. We will attempt to widen the anomaly to gain a clearer reading of what could be on the other side, assuming it is some for of tear through space. As with most experiments worth mentioning, this one will involve some explosives and a risk to the local environment but I have the utmost confidence that we shall achieve our goals to the highest standard.
Check the mission briefing for details on your current task.
The ship currently has $NUM$ person on board.
The ship currently has $NUM$ people on board.
Antimatter Cells(see 20201,201) are usually found for sale at the following stations:

It does seem that the anomaly was indeed a tear to some other location in space and by exciting it, we have inadvertently dragged this huge structure through it. We must make haste and investigate it further before any of the locals report it to some sort of 'scientific authority'. In such an event, this mysterious structure will attract every bored charlatan scientist and our opportunity would be lost!
You need blueprints to build station modules. If you have the credits, you can buy blueprints from a Faction Representative.
Details to follow. A fast combat ship is preferable.

To enact my plan, I have chartered a number of ships to act as decoy transports while I make my escape by other means. I would like you to escort one of the ships and make sure that they do not come to any harm. I would rather my reputation not take a sizeable hit during my first moments of regained freedom.

Now that I have once again gained my freedom, I can now put all my effort into unlocking the mysteries of this station. My initial findings point to it being some research facility, possibly Terran in origin, but with influences from several other cultures, including Boron. Whether it was a collaborative effort or through stolen technology, I can't say for sure.
We must first make sure that the facility runs as smoothly as possible.

I have successfully interfaced with the research systems of this facility and am ready to pursue a number of projects. Some of these are unique to this facility itself and seem to point to the existence of multiple universes!

We are free to use this research facility as we see fit. I do fear that one day some other inquisitive Boron from another universe will attempt to draw it into their universe, but until that day, it is ours to explore. I leave it to you to decide what avenues of research I should focus on.
I have an insatiable appetite for the history of our civilisations, especially that of the Argon-Xenon conflict. Should you find any historical accounts, I would be very happy to read them.

Some say that the time of exploration is over. I however believe that in this ever changing universe, we must constantly observe and curate everything! I will be monitoring your sensor logs with much interest!
It had been such a long time since I last had such prime BoFu! I do hope that you are able to procure more. Thank you my friend!
(logbook)Perhaps next time I will have better luck.
Deliver a ship with the following criteria:\n

page.title: Teladi Trade Guild
page.descr: Texts for the Teladi Trade Guild mission group and sub-mission variants
page.t: The well known and respected Teladi Trade Guild is always looking for skilled and proven traders to bolster our ranks. You have caught our attention and we wish to extend this invitation to you. If you are interested, please meet with me.

The path to profit often is a treacherous one, with both natural and artificial obstacles along the way. We at the Teladi Trade Guild believe that a proactive stance is needed to both protect our assets and clients as well as discourage any heinous acts against us.

Those who wish to make a profit can never help the natural and artificial obstacles that may stand in their way. That, however, does not mean that these obstacles cannot be overcome, and we believe that an active approach to dealing with these obstacles is necessary to protect both our assets and our clients.
We need a number of pilots to go out and deal with a number of potentially dangerous situations.
We are looking for experienced pilots capable of dealing with these problematic issues.
The Teladi Trade Guild is looking to expand its operations and influence in the local area. To do so, we must find opportunities to expand and act on them.
A stagnant operation is an unprofitable one, which is why the Teladi Trade Guild is looking to expand our presence in a number of areas.
A trusted business partner is requested to help us identify such opportunities and potentially provide assets to take advantage of them.
We need a versatile and skilled partner to act in the interests of the Teladi Trade Guild to help us in this endeavour.

An organisation as large and far-reaching as the Teladi Trade Guild will often run into mundane issues which limit its profitability. Should these issues never be addressed, it may well lead to financial loss. This is unspeakable.

We at the Teladi Trade Guild pride ourselves on managing a vast network of traders and leading them to profit. That said, we recognise that minor issues do occur which lead to reduced profit or even a loss.
We need a resourceful pilot to look into such issues and solve them so that we can guarantee hassle-free profit for our members.
An adaptable and skilled pilot is required to help us get a handle on these issues so that we can ensure continued profitability.
Our influence on the market goes far beyond simply ensuring our stations remain stocked and our traders remain active. We are of course here to turn a profit and we will do so by a number of means.

Running such a large and profitable organisation such as our own is a testament to our prowess in trade and management. It also highlights that our many strategies continue to work and bring in additional credits.

Controlling the price of goods with supply and demand is a time-tested technique to maximise our gains in this area. We require a Teladi Trade Guild member to perform a number of tasks to help shift the market in our favor.

Manipulating supply and demand to control the prices of goods works well to maximise our profits. To this end, a Teladi Trade Guild member should perform a number of tasks to help shift the market in our favour.

Intelligence is key to making sound business decisions, especially when that intel concerns your competition. It is also imperative that we keep an eye on our ships to ensure their safety and that they are not taking part in nefarious acts which could lead the Guild itself into disrepute.

Argon and Teladi share an old adage in that knowledge is power; in this case, the power to make a profit for one and all. In order to make the best possible business decisions, it is very important that we keep two eyes on both our competition and our own ships, as often as we can spare them, in order to ensure a broad and deep view of the current situation.
We need a pilot to help expand our sensor network in the local area.
We are looking for someone to help expand our sensor network to this endeavour.

Once an intelligence network has been built, it is vital to the operation that it is maintained, so that we can always have an ear to the ground and ensure not only that our competition remains behind us, but also that our members remain out of trouble.

We are keen to ensure that the vast intelligence network that we have already built is also properly maintained. This will allow us to keep an eye out for any new developments both within our own organisation and for our competition.
We seek a pilot who can help with this maintenance on our sensor network.
We are looking for someone to help make sure our sensor network is well maintained.

Some say that profit thrives in a warzone, and they are not necessarily incorrect, but there is little profit to be found for a trader that has a weapon pointed directly at them. The universe remains a dangerous place, and in order to ensure the safety of our assets and our clients, these dangers must be dealt with accordingly.

Though a lot of steps have been taken since the Jump Gates began to realign to ensure a safer and more peaceful life for all, there are still many dangers across the Jump Gate network. Not only for the sake of our profit, but of course for the sake of our and our clients safety, we must make sure that we deal with these dangers.
We are looking for pilots who feel like they can tackle these dangers, should they be in the form of Xenon incursions, pirates or other, more threatening menaces.
We would like someone to help us deal with these dangers, whatever they may be, without risking a loss of profit.

All economy stems from the natural resources that exist across the Jump Gate network. To give our members and clients the best start to their economic activities, we'd like someone to use resource probes to find strong resource regions in $SPACENAME$. Specifically, you should look for the following resources: $WARENAMES$

We would like to see an increase in the number of natural resources available for us, and in order to do that, we first want to prospect profitable regions. We'd like you to use resource probes in $SPACENAME$ to find strong yields of the following resources: $WARENAMES$

Many of our traders have been complaining about their trade routes being blocked by mines lay down by pirates and their competitors in recent times. We would like someone to deal with these mines so that our traders can go about their business in peace.

We are looking to improve our trading fleet with a new freighter. We have spent significant time looking into areas where we are falling flat and have identified an exact specification for this ship, and would like you to source it for us:\n$FLEET$

As part of our work to improve our intelligence network, we would like you to help build up our satellite network in an area of interest to a number of our members' competitors. This will allow our members to keep a better eye on the competition, and build trust in the Teladi Trade Guild.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

We have identified an area of space that shows a lot of potential to be a popular trading point in the near future. We would like to give our members as much of an advantage as possible, and so would like satellites to be placed in the area so we keep an eye on development and tell our members when the best time to start investing will be.

After a number of Xenon incursions and raids as of late, some of our members have asked us to ensure that their stations are kept safe. We take the safety of our members' assets very seriously, and would like to ask that laser towers be placed around some member stations to show that we are willing to help.

A number of our satellites have been broken by weapon-fire, accidental collisions and of course deliberate attacks and sabotage. As part of the maintenance of our network, we ask you to fly to these satellites and repair their hull to $PERCENTAGE$%.

A number of our members' stations have been suffering from a number of data leaks. This is not only harmful to our members but can also lead to significant problems for us, so we would like to ask that the leaks be dealt with in a timely fashion. We trust you to take care of this for us.

One of our courier pilots has reported that they were forced to drop a number of items while en route to one of our stations. A lot of Credits were paid for these items, so we need you to first find the crate that the items were dropped in, then recover the items for us.

This operation is more sensative than most: To keep you safe, we will only to you what you are required to know. We need you to board a station belonging to one of our member's competitors and make your way to the control rooms. From there, it is imperative that you quickly and quietly sabotage the station by hacking into its control panels. Good luck.\n$REQUIREMENT$

One of our courier pilots has got themselves trapped in a mine field and we need someone to lure the mines away from them. The mines should only be detonated if it is sure that our courier will not come to any harm. Once the mines are out of the way, the crew has instructions to resume their flight.

One of our couriers has been caught in a mine field. Though they were able to eject from the ship and pilot themselves to safety, the ship requires recovery. Please board the ship and clear the mine field, then plot a course to the designated station. There you can transfer ownership of the ship back to us.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

One of our members has placed an open request for some items that they seek on our notice board. It is not of very high priority, but if you find yourself with time to spare, you could help us by finding these items and taking them to the pilot. We are sure they would be very grateful for the work.

page.title: Antigone Trade Guild
page.descr: Texts for the Antigone Trade Guild mission group and sub-mission variants
page.t: The Antigone Trade Guild is looking for skilled and proven entrepreneurs to join our organisation and you have been flagged as a prime candidate. If you would like to discuss this further please come and meet me.

At the Antigone Trade Guild, we try to make it as easy as possible for our members to enjoy trading without interruption. Unfortunately, the Jump Gate network is full of both natural and created obstacles, and we must take an active approach to protect our members from them.

Those who are members of the Antigone Trade guild like to enjoy trading with as little interruption as possible. We take a proactive approach to providing this, dealing with any natural and created obstacles quickly and effectively, so that our our members may focus on what is important to them.
We are looking for someone to go out into space and deal with a number of potentially dangerous situations.
We are looking for those who can help us by dealing with these kinds of problematic obstacles.

We at the Antigone Trade Guild are ambitious, and ever looking for ways in which we can expand our operation to help even more traders make money. To this end, we must of course seek out new opportunities and act upon them.

To make sure we are serving our members as best we can, we must always keep moving forwards and look to grow our operation where we can. In order to do this, we are looking to expand our presence in a number of different areas.
We need a skilled and versatile businessperson to help us identify the opportunities we can use to grow and potentially provide assets in order to take advantage of them.
We are looking for a trusted business partner to act towards these interests, potentially providing assets to the Antigone Trade Guild, so that all members might gain from them.

The Antigone Trade Guild, much like the Antigone Republic, is built on people helping each other, even with the most mundane of problems. These problems, should they never be tackled, might cause problems for us all further down the line.

We recognise that our Guild is not yet at the same level as the Teladi Trade Guild, we strive to one day be better, which means learning to manage small problems before the grow and become unsolvable.

We look to solve such problems as quickly and effectively as possible, and we are seeking resourceful pilots to help us in this endeavour. This will help ensure convenient trading for all of our members.
We are looking for an adaptable and resourceful pilot to help us solve such problems quickly and efficiently so that all of our members can continue their endeavours and help us to grow.

At the Antigone Trade Guild it is our highest priority to make sure our members and all of their assets stay in business, and ideally also profitable. To achieve this, it is sometimes necessary to go the extra mile, beyond keeping our member stations in stock and making sure our members can trade at all.

Sometimes in order to keep our members in business and profitable, our number-one priority at all times, it is necessary to use techniques other than keeping our members' stations in stock and giving our members suggestions on where and how to get the best deal.

Controlling the price of goods by removing or adding a ware from the market in bulk not only allows us to ensure our members make a good profit on their trades, but also protects the economy against potential future collapses. We are looking for an Antigone Trade Guild member to help us with tasks relating to this goal.

A commonly-used technique for ensuring long-lasting profits is to manipulate the supply and demand of goods and thus to control their prices. This doubles somewhat as ensurance against potential economic collapse. We're currently looking for one of our members to perform a number of tasks to help shift the market in this way.

We are only able to do our work because of our vast and still growing intelligence network. It allows us not only to keep an eye on economic trends, but also to keep an eye on our competition when it is necessary, as well as working as an early-warning system when our own members reach trouble.

A lot of hard work has already gone into building our intelligence network. One of our greatest assets, it means we can know in advance if one of our members gets into trouble, we can keep an eye on our competition where we find it necessary and of course can quickly identify economic trends worth our members' attention.
We are looking for a pilot to help us further build and expand on the sensor network already in place.
In order to keep us up to date, we seek a pilot who will further build and expand on our sensor network.

It is not much use to build an intelligence network without then maintaining it. It is key to our Guild that this is done, so that we can continue keeping an eye out for market changes that may help our members, as well as helping us to keep an eye on our competition and keep our members out of trouble.

We wish to make sure that our intelligence network is not only expanded, but also properly maintained. This will allow us to notice quickly any changes to the economy that are of interest to our members, as well as enabling us to keep an eye on our competition and to make sure our own members stay out of trouble.
We are looking for a pilot who can help with this maintenance on our satellite network.
We need one of our members to help make sure our sensor network is well maintained.

As an organisation, our main objective is to ensure stress-free trading for all of our members, and this is difficult to achieve when there are so many threats across the Jump Gate network. We need to ensure the safety of our members and their assets, and to do that these need to be dealt with.

The Antigone Republic has been one of the driving forces behind creating a safer and more peaceful Jump Gate network, but there remain many threats that have yet to be dealt with. The Antigone Trade Guild recognises these threats as a danger to its members, and realises that these threats must be dealt with.
As such, we ask that a willing and able member of our Guild help us in tackling some of these dangers, whatever they may be.
To help us in this endeavour, we would like a willing and able member of our guild to deal with some of these threats.

To help our members who are interested in mining, we would like to find some local high-yield regions that we might share with them. We'd like someone to use resource probes to identify profitable mining spots in $SPACENAME$. Specifically, the resource probes should be used to find: $WARENAMES$

We are looking to expand into more mining activities, and would like to see a number of profitable regions in the area prospected to help us with this. We need you to use resource probes in $SPACENAME$ to find strong yields of the following resources: $WARENAMES$

We've been informed by some of our members that they have been held up by mines being placed at Gates and highway entrances along their trading routes, no doubt placed by pirates or their own competition. We would like you to deal with these mines so that our members can go about their business in peace again.

To deter some pirates lingering near our trade routes, we placed a couple of cheap mines. Knowing those pirates, the mines are probably good enough to do some damage to their ships and keep them from making trouble. However, the next inspection from Antigone bureaucrats will reveal, that the mines' software licence is long expired. To avoid paying a fee for using outdated and potentially dangerous technology, we want you to destroy them.

We are looking to grow our own merchant fleet with the addition of a new transporter. After significant work to analyse what exactly it is we need, based on areas where we feel we are falling short, we have identified an exact specification for this ship. We would like you to source it for us:\n$FLEET$

A number of our members have expressed an interest in knowing more about what their competitors are up to. We see an opportunity here to broaden our intelligence network, and so would like you to deploy a number of satellites in an area that we've identified as of interest to our members.

Sources tell us that one particular trader, not a member of our Guild, has the potential to significantly damage trading routes for not one but many of our members. We would like to be able to analyse the situation for ourselves, so we require a satellite to be deployed in the specified location.

A number of our members have been suffering from raids on their stations recently, as well as an increased number of Xenon incursions. The safety of Antigone Trade Guild members and the security of their assets is one of our top priorities, and as such we would like to see laser towers deployed around the affected stations.

Be it from stray weapon fire, accidental conditions or deliberate acts of vandalism or sabotage, a number of our satellites have been taken out of commission. As part of the maintenance to our network, we'd like you to fly to these satellites and repair their hull to $PERCENTAGE$%.

A number of our member stations are suffering from data leaks that are leaking very sensitive trading information, not only to our competition, but potentially also to pirates. We can't allow this data to be used harmfully - we need the leaks dealt with in a timely fashion.

A member of the Antigone Trade Guild was attacked while they were on a trading run, and reported to us that they were forced to drop some of their inventory to make sure it wasn't destroyed. The pilot is fine, at least physically, but unable to retrieve the items. Instead, we would like you to find the crate in which the items were dropped in, and then recover them on our behalf.

We don't usually condone these kinds of operations, but the matter is urgent and needs to be dealt with quickly and quietly. For your own safety, we will only tell you what you need to do. Without asking questions, please make your way to the designated station, board it and make your way to the control rooms. Once there, please use the appropriate equipment to... temporarily disarm the specified panel. Thank you and good luck.\n$REQUIREMENT$

One of our members found a mine field on their trade route and attempted to traverse it instead of going around. They are now stuck in a field of tracking mines. In order to rescue the pilot, we would like someone to lure the mines away from the ship. Be careful: The mines should only be detonated once it is certain that the pilot will not come to harm. When the mines have been cleared, the pilot knows to resume their flight.

One of our members has been caught in a minefield they were trying to traverse on their trade route. Once stuck, they were able to eject into a spacesuit and navigate out of the field, but the ship has been stranded. We'd like it to be returned to its owner. Please board the ship and clear the mine field, then plot a course to the station we've designated. There you can transfer ownership back to us.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

page.title: Argon Federation Police Missions
page.descr: Texts for the 'Argon Federation Police missions' and sub-mission variants
page.t: Pick up passengers and bring them to their destination.

page.title: Scale Plate Pact Missions
page.descr: Texts for the 'Scale Plate Pact missions' and sub-mission variants
page.t: You seem like someone who can get things done. If you want to earn a bit of extra cash, come and meet me. I'm sure we can come to some arrangement.

You don't create an organisation such as ours without making a few enemies along the way and there are a fair few people who would love to see us all spaced.\nWe have a number of individuals targetted, for various reasons. If you have great social skills and don't mind getting your hands dirty, sign up!

We've identified a number of high-value ships that we'd like to see commandeered for our own use. With the size of these ships and the numbers of their crews, we're not going to be able to convince them to bail, so we need to take the ships by force. For that, we need a good boarding crew. We want you to organise one and hand it over to us in return for payment.

We're very aware of how we're seen. We're not blind or deaf to the words pirates and brigands. The fact is we're not very popular, and a lot of people take it upon themselves to make sure we can't profit from the current universal climate. Well, we're not beyond fighting back, and we want to show that we will not be trifled with. If we make Credits along the way, then all the better for it.

The space we operate in is often not too secure when it comes to police presence but that also means we're at risk to a number of other threats out there. Be it Xenon or rival gangs, there's always something getting in our way or laying traps. On the other hand, we have to do the same. If you're available to protect our interests and disrupt theirs, let us know!

As a general rule, when you tell someone they can't have something, they only want it more. With the drugs that most governments have made illegal, this presents us with an opportunity that we're only too happy to take. If you're a safe pair of hands that wants to make some money, we're only too happy to take you on as part of our already very profitable network-wide smuggling operation.

Some of our ships have had quite a bit of trouble moving through nearby sectors recently. As far as we can tell, the satellite networks have been tracking our runs and have helped the locals get the jump on us. Naturally, we'd like to see a number of those satellites gone.
Mines are a very valuable tool, when placed by us. Otherwise, they're a constant annoyance and danger to our ships. We've identified a number of nearby mines which we would like removed.

A local station manager has clumsily forgotten their weekly payment to our cause, leaving us in a rather unfortunate situation. In the case that they overslept, how about making some noise around their station a bit?

Sometimes, the locals forget that space is a dangerous place and the unfortunate job of reminding them falls to you. And while the police deal with that mess, we'll be free to conclude some of our business elsewhere.

(male)We have started to branch out into more 'traditional' markets, earning the trust of a number of local traders. One of our guys needs transport to a local station so that he can broker a potentially lucrative deal.

(female)We have started to branch out into more 'traditional' markets, earning the trust of a number of local traders. One of our guys needs transport to a local station so that she can broker a potentially lucrative deal.

As you can expect, ships go for a high price on the market, especially those hosting very valuable information in their databanks. We have a certain target in mind and we're looking for an experienced partner to take control of the ship and give us access to certain logs. What you do with the ship is up to you.

A number of boarding operations have gone sideways as of late leaving us in need of new blood.
We are looking for $NPCCOUNT$ marines\(s\) for blah blah reason.
$DESTINATION$
$SKILLS$

We're aiming to have a bit more of an explosive presence in the nearby sectors. Too many police ships think they can just wander around like they own the place and the local freighters boost from A to B without a care in the world making them harder to corner.\nWe'd like a number of mines deployed to make things a bit more interesting around here.

Given the dangers to our ships in this area, we've decided that deploying a few mines will give us a bit of an edge should our opponents come after us. We're not expecting miracles but if we can put even a dent on a patrol vessel, it'll be worth it!
There are a number of areas with bottlenecks which we want to exploit by deploying a number of mines. Should we manage to damage or disable a ship, it'll make it a prime target for one of our teams.

(ma target)We've known for some time that $NPCName$ has been snitching on our activities so we began feeding him false info just to throw off the fuzz. It now looks like they're done with him and it's time we clean up this mess. Get it done quick and don't make us look bad.

(fe target)We've known for some time that $NPCName$ has been snitching on our activities so we began feeding her false info just to throw off the fuzz. It now looks like they're done with her and it's time we clean up this mess. Get it done quick and don't make us look bad.
(ma target)\nThey should be aboard the ship with ID: $SHIPID$.
(fe target)\nThey should be aboard the ship with ID: $SHIPID$.

(ma target)A agent of the local authorities has been causing us a whole host of problems. We've learned that their name is $NPCName$ and they're somewhat regarded as a hero in these parts. Unfortunately for them, we can't let them continue the way they are.

(fe target)A agent of the local authorities has been causing us a whole host of problems. We've learned that their name is $NPCName$ and they're somewhat regarded as a hero in these parts. Unfortunately for them, we can't let them continue the way they are.
(ma target)\nThey are most likely aboard the ship with ID: $SHIPID$.
(fe target)\nThey are most likely aboard the ship with ID: $SHIPID$.

One of our factories which produces some of our higher quality goods has been suffering a shortage of a number of resources recently. In order to keep up with demand, we need someone to dedicate some time to ensure said resources get there so production can be pushed to 100%. \n\nThey've requested that the station resource levels be raised above: $STORAGEPERCENT$%

One of our teams have identified a ship as a potential target for future operations but these days, we have to play it smart. We lost sight of this ship and need someone to pick it up so we can continue our preparations.

This is a little ironic but someone has stolen from us. I suppose it can't be helped when you keep the kind of company we do. Anyway, it's a simple task. Find him, rough him up a little and then get our stuff back.

This is a little ironic but someone has stolen from us. I suppose it can't be helped when you keep the kind of company we do. Anyway, it's a simple task. Find her, rough her up a little and then get our stuff back.

page.title: Argon vs Xenon War
page.descr: Texts for the 'Argon-Xenon war' mission-group and sub-mission variants
page.t: Due to our close proximity to Xenon space, we are looking for volunteers help secure our borders as well as repel any Xenon incursions. We have a wide variety of tasks to assign so whatever your skills do not hesitate to sign up!
We are looking for volunteers to protect our space from the Xenon. If you believe you have the skills to help us secure our borders and protect our people, sign up!
Xenon activity has been increasing for some time now and we must be prepared for the case that we are their target.
While lacking, our intelligence network in Xenon space seems to suggest that an attack in imminent.
While we believe that the Xenon are intelligent enough to learn from their actions, they continue to make the mistake of challenging us.
Our recon ships, at great risk to themselves, successfully provided vital information on Xenon activity. This gives us a major upper-hand in our operations.

The Xenon seem to be becoming more bold, if they are even capable of such behaviour. After probing our defences in the previous skirmishes, they seem to think our space is an easy target. Unfortunately, they're not far wrong.
While Federation Intelligence continues to analyse recent Xenon behaviour, we must make sure that our defences are prepared for the likely event of further Xenon aggression.
There are a number of high-priority tasks which will be vital in securing our space.

The Xenon have time and again proven to be a menace, but as we continue to learn about them, our ability to defend and fight back effectively improves. It is imperative that we hold out so that we can counter as soon as we are able.
We have a short window to shore up our defences and ready our people for the potential push from the Xenon. We're looking for independent contractors to help us with this.

The Xenon do not seem to understand why they continue to fail when attempting to engage us in our own space. While that is not to say we have not suffered losses, we pride ourselves on our strong defences against the 'force of nature' that is the Xenon.
Our reconnaissance teams confirm a build up of Xenon ships in their space and expect that they may soon make a move on us. While we have this respite, we will continue to prepare our defences.
We have learned much in the many years of conflict with the Xenon and we must use that knowledge to continue pushing them back.
We are preparing a large-scale effort in shoring up our defences in cooperation with local corporations and neighbouring allies. Any skilled pilots are also encouraged to take part.
Given the apparent strength of the Xenon forces amassing in their space, we current find ourselves at a disadvantage unless we can respond in kind and strengthen our own fleets and defences.
Our recent losses to the Xenon have left us at a distinct disadvantage should they continue their push into our space. We must continue to push on with securing our space and protecting our people.

With our forces being stretched we will begin a drive to shoring up our defences with the construction of defensive structures and new ships. While this is taxing on our infrastructure, it is imperative that we don't give the Xenon a free pass into our space.
We are looking for able individuals to aid our shipwrights as well as potentially invest significant time and resources into new construction projects.
While we only have a short window to shore up our defences, we expect any help in these areas will play a key part in future engagements with the Xenon.
The Xenon do have the advantage of self-replication to help shore up their numbers, but we have shown time and time again that the Argon Navy can put up a fight, even against the odds.
Groups of Xenon ships continue to mass around several entry points into our space. We don't know if they're aware that they are being monitored but it gives us a good look at their current strength.
Now is the time to make sure that our warships and static defences are ready to give the Xenon a grand welcome once they decide to give us a visit.
We are looking for individuals able to provide significant time and resources in helping us complete a number of large construction projects.
Individuals with experience in station or ship construction are encouraged to help aid with the coordination of several defence projects.

If there's one thing we have in common with the Xenon, it's our reliance on the natural resources in our respective territories. Of course, they have the advantage that they don't need to maintain farms like we do.
One of the areas that the Xenon seem drawn to are our resource fields where they often harass our mining ships. We also assume they're scouting for resources which they can use for their replication.
If we are to continue our struggle against them, as well as simply survive, we must be sure that our factories and shipyards continue to get the resources they need.

Our supply lines have previously been disrupted by Xenon activity to the point that it became a substantial risk to our fighting ability. To safeguard against this, we are to focus on preparing our infrastructure for any potential economic shock the Xenon may cause.

The recent Xenon activity, as well as our war with the Holy Order has put a sizeable strain on our infrastructure and supply lines, leaving us with slow construction projects and the onset of rationing. As we can not allow this to continue we are requesting the willing and able pilots to help us reverse the situation.

We expect the conflict with the Xenon will once again have some skirmishes occur in our territory. While we have enough measures in place to mitigate their activity, we must ere on the side of caution, especially when it comes to our supply lines.

It seems that the Xenon are preparing for some raids into our space. We are confident in our defences but it is foolish to underestimate the amount of damage the Xenon can cause when they run amok, especially to freighters and mining ships.

As we continue to press the Xenon, we must guarantee that our economy continues to function smoothly. This will include protecting our supply lines and mining areas as well as searching for any new sources of raw resources.

We have a number of tasks to both relieve economic stress on our infrastructure as well as safeguard supply lines and resource gathering areas. If you have the facilities to help, please consider signing up for assignment.

The Xenon have been pressing us quite hard recently, but it seems that we have an opening to deal them a blow. Any distraction which pulls them away from our space will give us a much welcome reprieve.

With the Xenon being a constant sight for such a long period of time, it has felt that we were on the back foot. However, our intelligence teams have found several targets worth engaging in the hope that it will have the Xenon pull back somewhat.
We will take any opportunity to repair our defences and redeploy our forces.

We would be fools to think we can predict what the Xenon will do, but we know that if we hit them hard enough, they will have no choice but to send at least a large chunk of their forces back home. We're looking for level-headed and skilled pilots, capable of doing the job and getting home safely.

They may have forced our hand but the Xenon are just as vulnerable to hit-and-run tactics as anyone else. As long as those involved come back safe, we believe this is worth the effort. Even if it doesn't have the desired effect, it will at least give the Xenon something to waste CPU cycles on.

We've managed to score some major victories against the Xenon as of late, but it certainly isn't a time to let up. While we expect a counter attack from them any time, we believe we can buy more time to organise our defences by striking sensitive targets.

We have known for some time that the Xenon might come for us again, as they have many times already. Our tactical teams are forever working to devise new ways to have the Xenon go in circles and this may just get their attention.
Any additional time we can get will be spent on better preparing for the next push against them as well as strengthening our current positions.
We're looking for a select number of skilled and experienced pilots who are confident in their ability to get behind enemy lines, cause some havoc and come back safely.
While we expect that the ever-restless Xenon are preparing another offensive against us, our intelligence agencies currently lack the resources to help us prepare our defences effectively.

In recent weeks we have been working with nought but rumour as we try to get on top of the Xenon's activities and intentions. While we know a new offensive is coming, details such as ship numbers and location remain lacking.

Our best people have been hard at work to come up with ways to help us improve the our intel and give us a helping hand in tracking the Xenon. Any solid information will give us a much higher chance to counter further aggression.

Over the many years of attempting to better understand the Xenon, we have taken many risks such as going deep into their space or salvaging their wreckage. Any interaction with Xenon, even those rendered inert, is thwart with danger.

We have a number of tasks available, some of which may involve spending time in Xenon territory or even interacting with the Xenon themselves. As such, these tasks are designated heavy risk. We require pilots confident enough to go behind enemy lines and skilled enough to come back safely.

A number of intel tasks are available. That said, given the dangers that operations in Xenon space pose, we are only looking for pilots who are confident in their ability to work behind enemy lines as well as get back in one piece.
Despite having favorable outcomes in our recent engagements with the Xenon, we can't overlook that our intelligence agencies are often working with outdated information.
If we want to continue holding the Xenon back the way we have been we must ensure that our intelligence is both up to date and reliable.
We have several options available to us to improve our intel to allow us to forumulate better strategies against the Xenon.
We are looking for trusted and skilled individuals to perform a number of these tasks, helping us maintain the upper hand.

Throughout this conflict, the Xenon have again proven to be a formidable force, making advances on several fronts. Along with our allies, we have held them back in several vital areas but we have lost ground.
We have commenced operations to reclaim our territories but we expect this will be a long and drawn out effort.

We are calling on all willing and able pilots to help us drive the Xenon out of our space. Tasks will involve backing up combat units as well as defending critical areas as we continue to regain a foothold.
Thanks to the efforts of the Argon Navy, our allies and volunteers such as yourself, we are currently in a prime position to deal a heavy blow to the Xenon.

Their constant aggression has thined out their forces and they find themselves on the back foot. While we can't expect to put an end to the Xenon once and for all, we can at least push them back far enough to secure our space.
We are looking for driven and skilled pilots willing to brave Xenon space and help with our efforts. Jobs will include linking with combat wings to both attack their positions as well as defend ours.

While there are others working on building larger military installations to help in our defence, many crucial areas still lack basic defences such as laser towers. This is something we want to resolve as quickly as possible.

The Xenon are a threat to all other races, and as such, we must cooperate where we can. There is a neighboring sector with an entry point for the Xenon where we feel it imperative that defences improve. We require a number of mines to be placed in this strategic location.

As you may well know, we share a border with the Xenon, although it's unclear if they even conceive borders. Either way, it is an incredibly important strategic location. We feel that sector security will be improved should we deploy a number of mines in that area.

We expect one of the reasons for the Xenon to intrude in our territory is to take advantage of our resource rich regions. To help secure these areas, we would like you to deploy a number of laser towers at strategic points which are critical to our economy.

At the request of our intelligence division, we require a single satellite to be placed in a vital area. We not only want to gain sensor data for that region, we also want to bait the Xenon into some response. Anything we can do to dictate their movements or reveal their strength will aid us when we have to make a move ourselves.

Though our main priority in this area is to keep an eye on the movements of the Xenon, a sensor grid is necessary to track any potential threats to our space. We are looking for you to acquire satellites and fill the holes in that net.\n$REQUIREMENTS$
While they may not last long, we would like the opportunity to deploy satellites and build a better picture of Xenon space and their ship movements.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

Several of our ships are in need of minor repairs and to help take the strain off of our shipyards, we are looking to make as many in-space repairs as possible. As the crew continues to repair the internal systems, we require additional help for the hull and external sub-sytems.

A number of specialists on Xenon behaviour and historical impact are to be transported to strategic locations to aid those preparing our defences. We require a number of pilots to come forward to provide safe and swift transport for these clients.

We are requesting a new military installation to be built in a strategic location to help us defend against any future aggression from the Xenon. We will require the facility to fit the following specifications.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

In order to plan future operations against the Xenon, we would like to guage what resources they have available to them in their space. Attempt to find high yield regions of the following resource: $WARENAMES$

Some time ago, we noticed a number of Xenon displaying strange behaviours on the edge of our space. We are still not sure what they were doing, but any odd behaviour from the Xenon is a cause for concern. While some of them have escaped deep into Xenon space, there are still a few which remain known to us and we would like them dealt with.
\nThe Xenon in question has been designated with ID: $SHIPID$.
The Xenon designated $SHIPID$ must be destroyed

While we believe some Xenon have capabilities to probe our systems remotely, there are still vital things they can learn by directly analysing our technology. A number of Xenon have been seen probing a number of wreckages before they could be salvaged, leading us to believe they were gathering data. We need these 'individuals' to be taken out.
\nThe Xenon in question has been designated with ID: $SHIPID$.

A number of scientists from several races have banded together to launch an independent expedition into Xenon space. Not only is this a completely reckless endeavour, it hands the Xenon a high-spec science ship full of valuable data right onto their lap. We need this ship stopped, preferably without bloodshed. A boarding operation is authorised.
As we push to take control of $SECTOR$, we require support for our combat units in whatever way possible.

One thing we believe gives us an edge on the Xenon is that no two people are the same. Given enough discipline, any two pilots can work together and become a capable team, even in the heat of battle. This gives us a very fluid presence on the battlefield which we don't think the Xenon can handle that well.
We are looking for $NPCCOUNT$ pilot\(s\) to undergo provisional tests for our rapid-response program.
$DESTINATION$
$SKILLS$

To make sure that our military installations are performing at peak efficiency during the war against the Xenon, we are looking for $NPCCOUNT$ engineer\(s\) to be brought to one of our stations.\n$DESTINATION$\n$SKILLS$

You cannot win a war without a fleet. Our shipyards are working at full capacity, but in order to bolster our numbers, we require the support of independent suppliers. To help in the war-effort, please bring the following ships to $SECTOR$ :\n$FLEET$

There have been concerns from several station managers that the increased Xenon activity will have a heavy impact on their supply lines. As the state of the local economy has a direct impact on our ability to construct defences we have agreed to assign a number of agents to help them stockpile resources.\n\nThe station related to this task requests that their resource levels are raised above: $STORAGEPERCENT$%

A number of Xenon ships of a certain spec have been causing us a lot of trouble recently. While any Xenon taken out is a good thing, we are keen to take these specific ships out of the picture as soon as possible. You will need to keep an eye out for Xenon with the following specification: $SHIP$

In the past, we have managed to perform detailed scans on a number of Xenon. To progress in our research, we require a follow up scan on a specific Xenon to better understand their development over time.\n\nTarget reveal percentage: $PERCENT$

One of our best chances to deal a significant blow to the Xenon is by disrupting their infrastructure. We're not too sure how much of it is involved in their ability to self-replicate, but they wouldn't have stations if they weren't important. We need one of these such stations scanned.\n\nTarget reveal percentage: $PERCENT$
We are interested in getting more detailed information on Xenon station modules to help us when planning future operation in Xenon space.\n\nWe need the following module scanned: $MODULE$

There have been reports of Xenon collecting salvage after battles, which is not unheard of. Some reports however mention them being interested in some items we would not have expected. To give these sightings more merit, we would like to catch a Xenon craft carrying some of these items. Once confirmed, we'll put additional effort into theorising what the Xenon could be using these items for.\n\n Find a Xenon ship containing: $WARE$
We have lost track of a Xenon ship of interest and need someone to help track it down. The ship in question has ID code $IDCODE$

Federation Intelligence assigned our task force to map out crucial targets in the Xenon energy networks. Such groundwork could enable the Argon Federation to cripple multiple Xenon facilities as a whole. To complete our survey we request additional scans of Xenon ships transporting Energy Cells.

Even the Xenon rely on basic resources to build their infrastructure. In an attempt to understand, predict and ultimately control their territorial behaviour through deterrents, our Xenon specialists from Sandwell request scans of Xenon ships transporting Ore.

While industrial espionage allows us to quickly catch up on any technological progress in the Gate network, the undeciphered Xenon communication protocols prevent us from gathering this kind of intelligence. However, being close to Xenon space grants us the unique opportunity to learn about their advances in economic organization. To achieve this, our Xenon specialists request scans of Xenon ships transporting Silicon.

page.title: Argon vs Holy Order War
page.descr: Texts for the 'Argon-Holy Order war' mission-group and sub-mission variants
page.t: The Holy Order, an offshoot faction of the Paranid Empire, continues to test our borders and those of our allies. These 'heretics', as described by the Godrealm of the Paranid, are being pushed from all sides with no allies to speak of. We are looking for trusted friends of the Argon Federation to help keep them in check.

The Holy Order grows more bold and desperate with each passing day and we must show them that the Argon Federation will not tolerate any incursions into our space. We are looking for volunteers to help us enforce that stance. If you believe you have the skills and fortitude, sign up!
The Holy Order again seem to be massing on our borders and we must be ready to deal with them.
The remains of our intelligence network in Holy Order space points to them preparing their forces.
Like before, the Holy Order continues to underestimate our resolve and preparedness.
Our intelligence links and recon ships confirm a build up of military assets in Holy Order.
It looks as though the Holy Order is once again preparing for a skirmish into our space, massing a number of ships on our borders.
What remains of our intelligence network in Holy Order space points to them preparing forces to make another push towards our territory.
While we continue to press the Godrealm of the Paranid to reign in their rebellion, we must remain vigilant and prepare for any outcome.
The Holy Order believes they have the upper hand but we will be sure to have our defences ready should they try their luck. We're looking for able bodies and minds to help us in this endeavour.

Time is short on us to make preparations. Defences are a priority and we're looking for independent contractors to coordinate with us in maintaining our existing countermeasures as well as deploying new ones.
The Holy Order continues to underestimate our resolve and preparedness, as they have many times before. They are readying for a move into our space, but they will not get their wish.
Our intelligence network and reconnaisance vessels confirm a build up of military assets in Holy Order space adjacent to our territory. We believe they are readying an 'invasion'.
Should they come, we will meet them as we have before and hold this sector with ease. We must of course be cautious and ready for whatever they throw at us.
We will coordinate with all local forces, corporations and any willing civilians to be sure that everyone is prepared. Will you join us in the defence of our people?
The Holy Order once again prepare to test us. Reports talk of many combat ships, from scouts to capital-class destroyers, stocked for days of conflict, massing on our borders.
We reach out again as the Holy Order prepare to test our already battered defences with newly built or prepared combat ships, armed to the teeth as always.

Our forces are stretched to a point where we must begin driving forward with the construction of new ships and defensive structures. Our shipwrights are hard at work putting together effective and capable warships while our engineering corps continue to build and maintain our static defences.
Any aid in these areas is much needed. We are looking for able individuals prepared to invest significant resources and effort in preparing our space for anything the Holy Order will throw at us.
While we only have a short window to shore up our defences, we expect any help in these areas will play a key part in future engagements with the Holy Order.
The Holy Order once again prepare to engage against us. They expect that we will bend and break under the force of their newly built fleets, but we know they're coming, and now we can prepare.

Scouting and intelligence reports talk of Holy Order ships massing at the Jump Gates leading towards our territory. As to be expected, it looks as though it is a strong offence, but when we know it's coming, we can prepare appropriately.
While our warships and static defences have proven themselves time and time again, we will continue to strengthen them in the face of aggression from the Holy Order.
We are looking for able individuals to aid us with significant time and resources in preparing our defences against anything the Holy Order can throw at us.

With reports stating that the Holy Order are building up their forces and rumours of war spreading like the plague, we have decided to take action. We assume that when the time does come, our defences will not be the only thing targeted.

We stand on the brink of another conflict with the Holy Order and must take action if we are to survive yet another onslaught. When the time comes, we must make sure we are ready for the worst case scenario.
We must be sure to safeguard the resources vital to our operations. This involves finding and protecting raw materials as well as stocking up whatever wares we are currently short on.

The Holy Order continue to make it difficult for our freighters to do their work effectively, but with the aid of pilots like you and the rest of the Argon federal forces, we will get our infrastructure running smoothly - so we can get back to dealing with the Holy Order aggression head on.

This conflict has put a sizable strain on our infrastructure and supply lines, leaving us with slow construction projects and the onset of rationing. We will not let this continue, but we require the skills of all able pilots to help us reverse the situation.

The Holy Order will soon attempt another strike at our territories, according to all trustworthy reports. Though it has not always been the case, we must assume they have learned from prior mistakes and will target more than our defences if they wish to destroy us.

Another day, another feeble attempt by the Holy Order to break our defences and our spirit. Reports indicate that they are preparing another attack, and we will be ready for them to attack not just our fleets and defences, but, desperately, our civilian structures as well.

As we press forward against the Holy Order, we must continue to guarantee that our economy continues to function smoothly. This will include protecting our supply lines and mining areas as well as searching for any new sources of raw resources.

The Holy Order are looking to make it difficult for our freighters but with the aid of pilots like you and the rest of the Argon forces, we will continue to keep our economy running smoothly so we can focus on dealing with the Holy Order aggression head on.

The intelligence network we have managed to set up in Holy Order territory has reported back that they are preparing yet another attack against us. We have decided to change our tactical response, in an attempt to change our fortune.

You have no doubt heard the rumours, or seen for yourself; the Holy Order is massing combat ships on our borders. We fear another assault on our territory, soon, and wish to take them by surprise in order to get the upper hand.
Given our position, we are looking to find and strike low risk targets in the hope that it can draw the Holy Order's attention from the fronts where our forces are stretched.
We expect that neutralising these targets will not only destabilise the cohesion of the current enemy forces, but will also give us a decisive edge when we are ready to counter.

While the Holy Order have forced our hand, we do believe that striking these targets will help turn the tide back in our favor. At the very least, it will give the Holy Order something to think about.

Once again our intelligence network has come through for us! We now know that the Holy Order is preparing another offensive against us, and our tacticians have already started planning our counter attack. We want you to take part!

We have known for some time that the Holy Order would try to push their luck, as they have many times already. Our tactical teams are forever working to find new ways to embarrass the Paranid rebels, and we are confident in this new plan.
As we continue to strengthen our position in our space, we must prepare for the next phase of the conflict with the Holy Order.
Before we commit a large number of our forces to the front, we first want to remove some strategic targets in order to destabilise the enemy defences.
While some signs point to the Holy Order planning another offensive against us, we lack the intel to be able to deploy our defences effectively.
In recent weeks we have been working with nought but rumour as we try to get on top of the Holy Order's plans. We believe they are planning a new offensive.

Intel has been a shortcoming for us so far in this conflict. We have made preparations to improve the situation but it will require skilled individuals to work alone and potentially behind enemy lines.

What intel we do have indicates that the Holy Order continues to be overconfident and often stretch beyond their means. With improved intel, we should be able to launch strikes when they are at their most vulnerable.

Our intelligence division is confident we can plug what gaps we have in our network and give us an edge on the Holy Order when we choose to strike. Of course, it will also aid us in protecting our borders against whatever they choose to throw at us.

While we continuously push the Godrealm of the Paranid to deal with these unruly rebels, the Holy Order, we do not expect a quick solution to their conflict. This has left our intelligence community with a lot work to do in a short amount of time with limited resources.

It might have been quite easy for the Holy Order to push straight through it were it not for our continuously impressive preparations; preparations we must continue to make if we wish to continue fighting the Paranid rebels. For this, we will use our greatest assets.
Throughout this conflict, we have proven that our intelligence division is much more capable than anything the Holy Order has. In order to move forward, we must continue to press this advantage.
We are looking for trusted individuals to put their skills to use against the Holy Order on their home turf. These tasks are not without risk but they will certainly help us maintain the upper hand.
As most likely know, we have been caught off guard several times in our conflict against the Holy Order, allowing them to make advances on several fronts.
We have commenced operations to drive them out of our territories, but this will be a prolonged struggle.

We need skilled pilots to aid in achieving our objectives. These will include backing up combat units when pushing the enemy back as well as holding out critical areas as we continue to rebuild our defences.
Thanks to the hard work of our people and allies, we find ourselves in a prime position to deal a heavy blow to the Holy Order.
They are currently on the back foot and we must continue to press them and hinder their ability to launch any form of aggression.
We are looking for brave and skilled pilots to help us ramp up the pressure. The situation is very volatile and tasks will shift from attacking enemy positions to defending our own.

While there are others working on building larger military installations to help in our defence, many areas still lack smaller defences such as laser towers. These require placing in areas that are vulnerable to enemy attack.

Given our current level of intel, we gauge there are only a few places that the Holy Order can launch an effective attack from. One of these areas is not in our space, but we feel it imperative to reinforce any potential entry point. We require a number of mines to be placed in this strategic location.
Mine our borders to Holy Order space

As you may well know, we share a border with the Holy Order, which makes that entry point an incredibly important strategic location. As part of our defensive plans for that area, we require a number of mines to be deployed there.
As part of our push to secure our resources from the enemy, we would like you to place defensive laser towers at strategic points in resource-heavy regions that are critical to our economy.

At the request of our intelligence division, we require a single satellite to be placed in a vital area. We not only want to gain sensor data for that region, we also want to bait the Holy Order into some response. Anything we can do to dictate their movements or reveal their strength will aid us when we have to make a move ourselves.

Though our main priority in this area is to keep an eye on the movements of the Holy Order, a sensor grid is necessary to track any potential threats to our space. We are looking for you to fill the holes in that net.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

Several of our ships are in need of minor repairs and to help take the strain off of our shipyards, we are looking to make as many in-space repairs as possible. As the crew continues to repair the internal systems, we require additional help for the hull and external sub-sytems.

A number of specialists on Holy Order tactics and history are to be transported to strategic locations to give direct assessments of our preparations. We require a number of pilots to come forward to provide safe and swift transport for these clients.

We are requesting a new military installation to be built in a strategic location to help us deter aggression from the Holy Order. We will require the facility to fit the following specifications.\n$REQUIREMENTS$

In order to plan future operations against the Holy Order, we would like to gauge what resources they have available to them in their space. Attempt to find high yield regions of the following resource: $WARENAMES$
(next ID reserved for gender)Take out Holy Order Agent

(ma target)We have identified a key player involved in several acts of espionage against us and our allies. $NPCName$ has been spotted posing as an entrepreneur on several of our stations while he meets with known Holy Order sympathisers. Unfortunately for him, the last one he met with is on our payroll.

(fe target)We have identified a key player involved in several acts of espionage against us and our allies. $NPCName$ has been spotted posing as an entrepreneur on several of our stations while she meets with known Holy Order sympathisers. Unfortunately for her, the last one she met with is on our payroll.
(ma target)\nThey were last seen flying a ship with ID: $SHIPID$. Make sure he doesn't come back from this one.
(fe target)\nThey were last seen flying a ship with ID: $SHIPID$. Make sure she doesn't come back from this one.

(ma target)During one of our last engagements with the Holy Order, one of our ships was lost. It seems that some of the wreckage was salvaged by the individual $NPCName$, who then went on to sell sensitive data pulled from the ship's databanks. Our contacts believe he is soon to contact another buyer and we must stop him from making the exchange, by any means.

(fe target)During one of our last engagements with the Holy Order, one of our ships was lost. It seems that some of the wreckage was salvaged by the individual $NPCName$, who then went on to sell sensitive data pulled from the ship's databanks. Our contacts believe she is soon to contact another buyer and we must stop her from making the exchange, by any means.
(ma target)\nThey're flying ship: $SHIPID$. Don't let him go any further.
(fe target)\nThey're flying ship: $SHIPID$. Don't let her go any further.

We have determined a certain Holy Order ship to be a prime target for a data-extraction operation. The ship must be engaged, boarded and its data-core cloned for us to analyse. The information contained in that ship may be decisive in the battles to come.

The time has come to make an offensive push to remove the Holy Order from this sector. We have full confidence in our fleet and our pilots, but they will require some support as they fight. We would like you to provide this support for us.

To greater improve our chances of striking back against the Holy Order, we are looking for $NPCCOUNT$ pilot\(s\) to take command of our ships. These pilots should be brought to one of our stations before the fighting starts.\n$DESTINATION$\n$SKILLS$

To make sure that our military installations are performing at peak efficiency during the war against the Holy Order, we are looking for $NPCCOUNT$ engineer\(s\) to be brought to one of our stations.\n$DESTINATION$\n$SKILLS$

You cannot win a war without a fleet. Our shipyards are working at full capacity, but in order to bolster our numbers, we require the support of independent suppliers. To help in the war-effort, please bring the following ships to our headquarters:\n$FLEET$
We need to keep the production running and need your help in fulfilling the open trade-orders. Try to get above the specified minimum storage threshold.\n\nMinimum storage level: $STORAGEPERCENT$%
(singular)Track down a ship matching the following specification and destroy them.$SPECS$
(plural)Track down ships matching the following specification and destroy them.$SPECS$

Federal Intelligence is supporting a splinter cell of the Holy Order to gather intel and disrupt the Order's administrative capabilities. Our aid consists of water transports to feed the cell's workforce. However, Intelligence recognised a small but unexpected increase in the Holy Order's population, and is now concerned about the cell's loyalty. Thus, the last deliveries have been marked with an isotope. To confirm that our federal resources are not being used against the Argon Federation, Intelligence requests scans of Holy Order ships transporting Water.

Since the Paranid Empire seems to be unwilling or unable to deal with its rebellion any time soon, the Argon Federation is initiating the appropriate steps to contain these fanatical pirates and secure our trade and our borders. To this end, Federal Intelligence suggests an evaluation of their access to Hull Parts. These numbers tell us how much firepower we have to bring along in order to turn their ships, stations, hopes and dreams into space dust. To aid Intelligence in their evaluation, provide scans of Holy Order ships transporting Hull Parts.

To locate security breaches within their ranks, the Paranid Rebellion set up this minefield and leaked its location to specific branches of their military command. Targeting it diverts their counterintelligence from our agents.
This minefield is an obstacle to a manoeuvre our captains might want to execute. Strategic Planning thus requested it to be removed before a battle takes place in its vicinity.

There are a couple of laser towers that would expose nearby undercover ships executing a mission. We have to assume that they lack knowledge of these towers. Additionally, we cannot warn them as the communication attempt would uncover them. To ensure their success, we have to take out the towers.

One Holy Order strategist is quite incompetent, yet he is a candidate for promotion. We do our best to make it look like his predictions are correct, to encourage them to promote him. Lately, he suspected that we would target a specific group of laser towers.

page.title: Paranid vs Holy Order War
page.descr: Texts for the 'Paranid-Holy Order war' mission-group and sub-mission variants
page.t: (missiongroup)The Righteous Paranid Empire Vs. the 'Heretical Order'

Our burning holy light continues to grow with each passing day. We find ourselves tested with our own brethren being led astray by their own hubris. While we hope to bring a number of them back into the fold, their 'governing' leaders wish them to continue down this path of blasphemy and destruction. We seek to uplift those willing to aid the Paranid Empire, so that they can bathe in its glory. Should you have faith in your abilities, we are willing to listen to your pleas.

As our glorious Paranid Empire continues to lead the lesser races through their uncertain times we must also look inward to improve ourselves. A number of Paranid, mislead by times of crisis, have turned to blasphemy in the attempt of find meaning in their suffering.\nWe seek those willing to defend the true path of the Paranid from those who have been led astray. Only those who are worthy have been given the honour of this invitation.
The blasphemous 'Holy Order' has once again exploited the lesser races to give them strength to oppose us. As short as their rebellion may be, we do expect the losses to be worthy of note.

A holy war continues to rage between our two Paranid factions. While our distaste for them remains, we must concede that the Paranid of the so-called 'Holy Order' have a resolve worthy of acknowledgement.
The heretics of the 'Holy Order' continue to bring destruction upon themselves, forgetting the might of the true Paranid Empire.

We Paranid must remain the driving force of justice as well as the prime example of scholastic achievement. The Order would however wish to emulate the lesser beings; bringing destruction and discord to the Paranid race. Unacceptable.
The so-called 'Holy Order' once again seeks to encroach on our territory. Until they forsake their false pontiff, we will remain strong on our opposition.

A number of Paranid risked their entire being to deliver us with information on the heretics of the 'Holy Order'. Those who did not return will be forever remembered in the annals of the Paranid Empire.

Those whom call themselves our allies persist in their struggle against the Order. This does afford us the opportunity to reevaluate our position and prepare a suitable response to any further aggression.

Their beliefs continue to give them false hope and such mistakes must be corrected. Once they push into our space, they will witness their 'advantage' turn to tasteless ash. We welcome those who also wish to observe their folly.
Our race is a proud one. We will not accept anything less than the most unwavering defence possible. Should you have the skill to aid in such a feat, you are encouraged to contact us.

While our space remains well guarded, we must not falter in our duty to maintain and expand our defences. Should the heretics of the Order wish to test them, we must ensure that they are met with nothing but destruction.
Our vast intelligence network continues to pry into the movements of the Order and we calculate that their desperation will force them to launch a rash attack on our territory.
While we seek to enlighten them on their misguided views, we will not waver in our resolve to defend our space.

As we move our holy fleet into strategic positions along our border, we are prepared to give worthy pilots the opportunity to aid us with the placement of static defences in our space. Contact us if this interests you.
In these testing times, we must show our stength so that the heretics of the Order will recognise the error of their ways.
The unworthy Paranid of the Order try our patience once more, seeking to push into our space. We wish to welcome them with an undeniable show of strength.
The majority of our forces find themselves engaged on other fronts, leaving us with a number of openings which the Order may attempt to take advantage of.
We are willing to give industrious individuals the honour of aiding us to construct and maintain large-scale defensive structures. Contact us if you have such skills.
We seek those with time and fortitude to construct structures worthy of defending Paranid space. Do not bother us if you are not willing to invest significant effort into this endeavour.
The dissidents of the Order once again find themselves forced into desperate action against us. They forget the might of the true Paranid empire and they will fail in any attempt to enter our space.

The ships of the Order have begun to mass in what appears to be a feeble attempt to intimidate us. As they approach our space, we want them to experience the unyielding force that is the true Paranid Empire.

We see little need to trouble our forces with redeployments at this state as we remain capable of striking any location at short notice. With this in mind, we shall instead sanction the construction of new defences.

Any able individuals willing to join us in strengthening our glorious empire are encouraged to contact us. This task will involve significant time and resources. As such, we warn all applicants to be prepared so that you do not waste our time.
Several of our sources have reported that so-called 'Holy Order' have started resorting to lesser tactics such as pillaging freighters and sabotaging production lines.

As we find ourselves facing fellow Paranid as foes, we must not underestimate their intellect, no matter how misguided they may be. Their actions have shifted to detestable tactics against a number of allied factions, including sabotage and thievery.

It is of utmost importance that we safeguard all resources vital to our operations, especially against these despicable infidels. This will involve finding and protecting raw materials as well as ensuring that our current supplies are plentiful.

It seems that The Order wishes to prove their path is righteous by sullying their hands. The time to see the folly of their ways will soon come, although it shall come much sooner with aid of trusted pilots such as yourself.

This damnable conflict has highlighted a multitude of economic deficiencies, of which we were swift to correct. We are not blind to see that efforts from pilots such as yourself and the mighty Paranid Fleet are required to keep such a system in balance and working order.
After the many failing of the Order, it appear that they have begun to shift to lesser tactics, attacking our freighters and sabotaging resource gathering areas.
As our defences remain strong, the Order seem desperate to find a tactic to give us pause in our aggression. We have reason to believe they will target our supply lines and resources.

We will continue to press forward against the Holy Order but we must not lose sight of our empire as a whole. We must ensure that all resources required for our efforts continue to be supplied and that our civilian crews remain safe.

The heretics of the Order seek to undermine our infrastructure and dishearten our people; a laughable goal. We will be sure to answer in kind with able pilots such as yourself protecting our interests.
We have been somewhat displeased with the outcome of recent engagements with the Order and as you may fathom, we will not accept such a status quo to remain.

Those damnable heretics of the Order again try our patience with frivolous pushes into our space. They may well hope to provoke us into a response, but they severely underestimate our strength and zeal.

Our intelligence division has formulated a number of tactics draw the Order into a disadvantageous position. Many of the targets are classed as low-risk, to help increase the chances of success as well as allow more operations to happen concurrently.

Neutralising these targets will not only serve to shame them, but will also give the majority of our forces a chance to focus on preparing for the next major battle. Should you wish to aid in these operations, sign up immediately.

With the Order dealing with the fallout of our actions in their space, we will take the advantage to fortify our borders before striking with the full force of our fleets. Skilled pilots willing to operate behind enemy lines are encouraged to contact us.
Once again, our finest minds in the intelligence division have provided us with the knowledge we need to continue to strike the Order where it greatly hurts them.
As we expected, the Order remains intoxicated by pride, leading them to make rash tactical decisions. We find that it is time to make them suffer for it.

We will strike a number of targets in their space as part of a grand strategy to draw them out of position. Their current battle plans will fall by the wayside and we will capitalise on the ensuing confusion.
We are asking for a number of brave individuals to aid us in this glorious mission. It is not without danger, but with the might of the Paranid Empire behind you, victory is ever attainable.
